analyzed: de'i phyi rol du cha chung gnyis pa'i padma'i 'dab ma'i phreng ba'i khor yug gi thig zlum po 'dab ma'i rtse mos reg pa chos 'byung gi cha mtshon par byed pa'o //
translated: Outside of that, the circle of the surrounding garland of lotus petals of two small units, touching the tips of the petals, indicates the part of the source of phenomena.

original: kha cig na re gang du yang bde mchog la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyad par 'ga' zhig la chos 'byung bsgom pa med pa de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi nang du chud pa kho na yin pas thig de ni chos kyi dbyings mtshon pa yin no zhes
analyzed: kha cig na re gang du yang bde mchog la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyad par 'ga' zhig la chos 'byung bsgom pa med pa de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi nang du chud pa kho na yin pas thig de ni chos kyi dbyings mtshon pa yin no zhes
translated: Some say that wherever there is no meditation on the source of phenomena in any of the maṇḍalas, such as Cakrasaṃvara, and so on, it is included within the realm of phenomena, so that line indicates the realm of phenomena.

original: so // gzhan dag ni de khor yug chen po'i ngo bo yin no zhes so //
analyzed: so // gzhan dag ni de khor yug chen po'i ngo bo yin no zhes so //
translated: Others say that it is the nature of the great outer enclosure.

original: de'i phyi rol du cha chung gnyis pa'i rdo rje'i phred pa'i thig zlum po ste /
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du cha chung gnyis pa'i rdo rje'i phred pa'i thig zlum po ste /
translated: Outside of that, the line of the cross-vajra is two small units in diameter.

original: mthug cing sra ba khor yug chen po'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: mthug cing sra ba khor yug chen po'i ngo bo'o //
translated: It is thick and solid, the essence of the great outer ring.

original: rdo rje'i snam bu la rdo rje rtse gsum pa rnams sam /
analyzed: rdo rje'i snam bu la rdo rje rtse gsum pa rnams sam /
translated: On the vajra base, one should draw either three-pointed vajras,

original: rtse lnga pa rnams sam sna tshogs rdo rje rnams kyang rung ste lung ji lta bar bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: rtse lnga pa rnams sam sna tshogs rdo rje rnams kyang rung ste lung ji lta bar bri bar bya'o //
translated: or five-pointed vajras, or crossed vajras, according to the scriptures.

original: de'i phyi rol du cha chung bzhi pa'i 'od zer gyi sa'i thig zlum po ni 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshad mnyam par bya ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du cha chung bzhi pa'i 'od zer gyi sa'i thig zlum po ni 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshad mnyam par bya ba'i don du'o //
translated: Outside of that, the line of the light ground is four small units in diameter. It is for the purpose of equalizing the extent of the radiating light.

original: de nyid kyi phyir der tshon gyi re kh'a mi bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir der tshon gyi re kh'a mi bya'o //
translated: For that very reason, one should not draw the lines of color there.

original: kun dga' snying po ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor las phyi rol du khor yug zlum por gdab po zhes so //
analyzed: kun dga' snying po ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor las phyi rol du khor yug zlum por gdab po zhes so //
translated: The essence of joy is to be placed outside of the mandala of light as a circular outer ring.

original: rta babs kyi glo rnams su ni dar dpyangs kyi snam bu'i steng du chu srin gyi kha las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i ra @25a * //
analyzed: rta babs kyi glo rnams su ni dar dpyangs kyi snam bu'i steng du chu srin gyi kha las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i ra @25a * //
translated: On the sides of the gateways, above the streamers, there is a crossed vajra arising from the mouth of a makara.

original: rnams ni cung zad gzhogs su song nas phyir 'byung ba dbus kyi rgyar cha chung gsum dang ldan pa srid du cha chung bcu drug pa'o //
analyzed: rnams ni cung zad gzhogs su song nas phyir 'byung ba dbus kyi rgyar cha chung gsum dang ldan pa srid du cha chung bcu drug pa'o //
translated: The sides of the archway are slightly slanted and then come out again, with a width of three small units in the middle and a height of sixteen small units.

original: sna tshogs rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyogs la ra'i 'gram du rab gzhan dag go //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyogs la ra'i 'gram du rab gzhan dag go //
translated: The five-pointed vajra-cross is at the side of the archway.

original: rta babs kyi ka brtsig pa'i thig las 'thon zhing cha chud bdun pa'o zhes pa'i phyogs ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: rta babs kyi ka brtsig pa'i thig las 'thon zhing cha chud bdun pa'o zhes pa'i phyogs ni mi rigs te /
translated: The statement that the pillars of the archway come out from the line of the wall and are seven small units is incorrect.

original: gzhal yas khang las chung zad ring bar rta babs kyi ka ba rnams re re zhing stegs bu gru bzhi pa la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang las chung zad ring bar rta babs kyi ka ba rnams re re zhing stegs bu gru bzhi pa la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the pillars of the archway are slightly longer than the celestial mansion and rest on a square platform.

original: sa mnyam po la gnas pa nyid kyis stegs bu dang 'brel pa bzhin mthong bas stegs bu'i phyi ngos su 'di rnams bri bar rigs so //
analyzed: sa mnyam po la gnas pa nyid kyis stegs bu dang 'brel pa bzhin mthong bas stegs bu'i phyi ngos su 'di rnams bri bar rigs so //
translated: Since they appear to be connected to the platform because they rest on the same level, it is correct to draw them on the outside of the platform.

original: de bzhin du bar gyi snam bu ni steng du bzhi chas nyung ba'i sgo gnyis kyi tshad yin no zhes ba ni 'chal pa'i rtog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bar gyi snam bu ni steng du bzhi chas nyung ba'i sgo gnyis kyi tshad yin no zhes ba ni 'chal pa'i rtog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, the statement that the middle ledge is the size of two doors, with a reduction of one quarter on top, should be understood as a faulty conception.

original: de lta bu 'di ni phyogs gcig brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu 'di ni phyogs gcig brjod pa'o //
translated: This is the description of one direction.

original: rtsa ba'i thig bzhis yongs su bcad pa'i rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor kho na las thig skud nyis 'gyur gyis ring ba ste /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig bzhis yongs su bcad pa'i rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor kho na las thig skud nyis 'gyur gyis ring ba ste /
translated: The thread should be twice as long as the basic maṇḍala, which is divided into four parts.

original: des tshangs pa'i thig cha chung drug cu rtsa bzhi gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: des tshangs pa'i thig cha chung drug cu rtsa bzhi gdab par bya'o //
translated: With that, sixty-four small squares should be laid out on the thread of Brahmā.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: As is said:

original: tshangs thig gi ni logs re re ra //
analyzed: tshangs thig gi ni logs re re ra //
translated: On each side of the thread of Brahmā,

original: cha chen brgyad rnams gdab par bya //
analyzed: cha chen brgyad rnams gdab par bya //
translated: eight large squares should be laid out.

original: cha chen 'di rnams nyid la ni //
analyzed: cha chen 'di rnams nyid la ni //
translated: On these large squares,

original: re re zhing yang cha chung bzhir //
analyzed: re re zhing yang cha chung bzhir //
translated: each one is divided into four small squares.

original: de nas tshangs thig logs re re ra //
analyzed: de nas tshangs thig logs re re ra //
translated: Then, on each side of the thread of Brahmā,

original: cha chung sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: cha chung sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: there are thirty-two small squares.

original: cha chen sgo yi tshad yin te ;
analyzed: cha chen sgo yi tshad yin te ;
translated: The large squares are the size of the gates,

original: / bzhi cha cha chung brgyad cha bzhi //
analyzed: / bzhi cha cha chung brgyad cha bzhi //
translated: with four small squares each.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: This is stated.

original: gzhan du yang brjod pa /
analyzed: gzhan du yang brjod pa /
translated: It is also said elsewhere:

original: dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur lhag par ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur lhag par ni //
translated: The maṇḍala should be made twice as large,

original: gru bzhi dag par yang dag byas //
analyzed: gru bzhi dag par yang dag byas //
translated: perfectly square.

original: de nas thig skud dkar byas nas //
analyzed: de nas thig skud dkar byas nas //
translated: Then, having made a white thread,

original: rang nyid sgrub pa'i grogs dang ldan //
analyzed: rang nyid sgrub pa'i grogs dang ldan //
translated: one should have a companion for one's own practice.

original: tsandan dkar po bsres pa yi //
analyzed: tsandan dkar po bsres pa yi //
translated: And mixed with white sandalwood.🔽

original: s'a lu btags pas spang bar bya //
analyzed: s'a lu btags pas spang bar bya //
translated: One should avoid the rice mixed with white sandalwood.

original: tshangs pa'i thig ni dag pa gnyis //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i thig ni dag pa gnyis //
translated: The two pure lines of Brahmā

original: 'khor lo'i tshang ni gang yin pa //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i tshang ni gang yin pa //
translated: are the circumference of the maṇḍala.

original: de yi nyis 'gyur gdab par bya //
analyzed: de yi nyis 'gyur gdab par bya //
translated: One should draw them twice

original: de yi phyed du rtsa ba'i thig //
analyzed: de yi phyed du rtsa ba'i thig //
translated: and half of that is the basic line.

original: ces so // tshangs pa'i thig gi rtse mo'i pha rol du padma'i ge sar dang / padma'i 'dab ma dang / rdo rje dang 'od kyi phreng ba rnams kyi thig zlum po'o //
analyzed: ces so // tshangs pa'i thig gi rtse mo'i pha rol du padma'i ge sar dang / padma'i 'dab ma dang / rdo rje dang 'od kyi phreng ba rnams kyi thig zlum po'o //
translated: Beyond the tip of the line of Brahmā, the line of the pericarp of the lotus, the line of the petals of the lotus, the vajra line, and the line of the garland of light are circles.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: khor yug gi ni nang du yang //
analyzed: khor yug gi ni nang du yang //
translated: Even inside the outer circle,

original: srid du sgo yi bcu drug go //
analyzed: srid du sgo yi bcu drug go //
translated: the length is sixteen doors.

original: zhes bshad pa ni ge sar gyi re kh'a nas brtsams nas khor yug tu 'dod do //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa ni ge sar gyi re kh'a nas brtsams nas khor yug tu 'dod do //
translated: This is explained as the desire for the line of the pericarp up to the outer circle.

original: de ji ltar rigs te ge sar dang 'dab ma dang / chos 'byung rnams ni rdo rje'i phreng ba dang ma 'brel la /
analyzed: de ji ltar rigs te ge sar dang 'dab ma dang / chos 'byung rnams ni rdo rje'i phreng ba dang ma 'brel la /
translated: How is that appropriate? The pericarp, petals, and source of phenomena are not connected with the vajra garland.

original: rdo rje phreng ba'i tshul can rdo rje'i rab ni khor yug @25b du bshad do //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba'i tshul can rdo rje'i rab ni khor yug @25b du bshad do //
translated: The vajra line in the manner of the vajra garland is explained as the outer circle.

original: de ltar yang 'phags pa klu'i zhal snga nas /
analyzed: de ltar yang 'phags pa klu'i zhal snga nas /
translated: Thus, the noble Nagarjuna says:

original: rta babs rdo rje'i rtse mo can //
analyzed: rta babs rdo rje'i rtse mo can //
translated: The archways have vajra-tips.

original: de yi phyi rol khor yug ste //
analyzed: de yi phyi rol khor yug ste //
translated: Outside of that is the circular wall,

original: rdo rje'i phreng ba 'od bzang ldan //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i phreng ba 'od bzang ldan // zhes gsungs so //
translated: endowed with a beautiful light of a vajra garland.

original: 'dis ni rdo rje phreng ba nyid //
analyzed: 'dis ni rdo rje phreng ba nyid //
translated: This clearly states that the vajra garland itself

original: khor yug 'od bzang ldan zhes gsal bar brjod do //
analyzed: khor yug 'od bzang ldan zhes gsal bar brjod do //
translated: is the circular wall endowed with a beautiful light.

original: ci ste zlum skor du mthun pa'i phyir ge sar la sogs pa yang khor yug dang 'dra bas khor yug tu btags la /
analyzed: ci ste zlum skor du mthun pa'i phyir ge sar la sogs pa yang khor yug dang 'dra bas khor yug tu btags la /
translated: If you ask, “Why is the pericarp, etc., also called a circular wall because it is similar to a circular wall, since it is in accord with a circle?

original: 'di rnams btags par yang bzhed pa yin par go bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di rnams btags par yang bzhed pa yin par go bar bya ste /
translated: You should understand that it is also accepted as a designation,

original: de'i phyi rol zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhe na gal te de ltar na de ni legs par brjod do //
analyzed: de'i phyi rol zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhe na gal te de ltar na de ni legs par brjod do //
translated: because it says ‘outside of that’? If it is so, that is a good statement.

original: kha cig na re de bas tshig 'di nyid kyis ge sar la sogs pa med do zhes pa ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: kha cig na re de bas tshig 'di nyid kyis ge sar la sogs pa med do zhes pa ni mi rigs te /
translated: Some say: It is not correct to say that the pericarp, etc., do not exist because of this statement,

original: padma la sna tshogs rdo rje gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: padma la sna tshogs rdo rje gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a vajra cross is located on the lotus.

original: kha cig tu ni padma dang chos 'byung med par yang de yod do zhes gsungs so zhe na //
analyzed: kha cig tu ni padma dang chos 'byung med par yang de yod do zhes gsungs so zhe na //
translated: In some places it is said to exist without a lotus or source.

original: de ltar 'dir padma'i 'dab ma dang bcas pa nyid la der btags pa legs so //
analyzed: de ltar 'dir padma'i 'dab ma dang bcas pa nyid la der btags pa legs so //
translated: Thus, it is good to designate it here as having lotus petals.

original: bsdus pa'i rim par yang /
analyzed: bsdus pa'i rim par yang /
translated: In the concise stage,

original: brtan g-yo'i bdag nyid stong par bsgoms nas su //
analyzed: brtan g-yo'i bdag nyid stong par bsgoms nas su //
translated: having meditated on the emptiness of the nature of the animate and inanimate,

original: cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
analyzed: cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
translated: by this method of ritual,

original: ye shes sa gzhi byin gyis brlab //
analyzed: ye shes sa gzhi byin gyis brlab //
translated: one should bless the ground of wisdom.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par //
translated: In the center of the realm of space,

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on the mandala of wind.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa nas //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa nas //
translated: and so forth, up to

original: dkyil 'khor bzhi bsdus rdo rje yis //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bzhi bsdus rdo rje yis //
translated: the vajra that includes the four mandalas

original: sa yi cha yi dkyil 'khor te /🔽der ni bh'um yig las byung ba'i //
analyzed: sa yi cha yi dkyil 'khor te / der ni bh'um yig las byung ba'i //
translated: is the mandala of the part of the ground.🔽There, one should meditate on the celestial mansion

original: gzhal yas khang bar rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang bar rnam par bsgom //
translated: arisen from the syllable bhrūṃ.

original: zhes pa'i bar du ste /
analyzed: zhes pa'i bar du ste /
translated: Up to here.

original: 'dir ye shes sa gzhi dang nam mkha'i khams ni chos 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'dir ye shes sa gzhi dang nam mkha'i khams ni chos 'byung ngo //
translated: Here, the ground of wisdom and the realm of space are the source.

original: de'i dbus ni padma'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus ni padma'o //
translated: In its center is the lotus.

original: der gnas pa'i rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi 'dres par gyur pas /
analyzed: der gnas pa'i rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi 'dres par gyur pas /
translated: The four maṇḍalas of wind, fire, water, and earth that exist there merge.

original: sa'i cha sna tshogs rdo rje'i ngo bor bskyed nas /
analyzed: sa'i cha sna tshogs rdo rje'i ngo bor bskyed nas /
translated: The earth part is generated as the essence of a vajra cross.

original: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bh'um las gzhal yas khang ngo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bh'um las gzhal yas khang ngo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: On top of that, the meaning is that the celestial mansion arises from bhrūṃ on a moon maṇḍala.

original: de nas 'dir padma med par sna tshogs rdo rje'o zhes pa ni cher 'khrul lo //
analyzed: de nas 'dir padma med par sna tshogs rdo rje'o zhes pa ni cher 'khrul lo //
translated: Then, “here there is no lotus, but a vajra cross” is a great error.

original: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba ni sgo'i tshad bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba ni sgo'i tshad bcu gnyis so //
translated: The center of the vajra cross is twelve cubits, the measure of a door.

original: de'i rab rnams kyi srid du so sor sgo gnyis so //
analyzed: de'i rab rnams kyi srid du so sor sgo gnyis so //
translated: Each side is two cubits.

original: de la rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du sgo'i tshad brgyad do //
analyzed: de la rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du sgo'i tshad brgyad do //
translated: Inside the primary lines, there are eight cubits, the measure of a door.

original: phyi rol srid du sgo gnyis so //
analyzed: phyi rol srid du sgo gnyis so //
translated: Outside, it is two cubits.

original: de la bar skabs kyi snam bu med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de la bar skabs kyi snam bu med pa nyid do //
translated: There is no intermediate band.

original: rta babs ni rta babs kyi ka ba'i bar du dos su sgo las sum 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rta babs ni rta babs kyi ka ba'i bar du dos su sgo las sum 'gyur ro //
translated: The pediment is three times the height of the door up to the pediment pillar.

original: ka ba'i steng gi rta babs de'i dpangs su sgo gcig gi tshad la snam bu bcu gcig go //
analyzed: ka ba'i steng gi rta babs de'i dpangs su sgo gcig gi tshad la snam bu bcu gcig go //
translated: On top of the pillar, the height of the pediment is one cubit, with eleven bands.

original: de la go rims @26a * //
analyzed: de la go rims @26a * //
translated: The order of the four is as follows.🔽

original: bzhin du rin chen shar bu dang / rin po che dang / rta mig dang gser dang / chu srin dang / gser dang / rmig pa dang / rin po che dang / rmig pa dang / gser dad mda' yab rnams kyi snam bu ste /
analyzed: bzhin du rin chen shar bu dang / rin po che dang / rta mig dang gser dang / chu srin dang / gser dang / rmig pa dang / rin po che dang / rmig pa dang / gser dad mda' yab rnams kyi snam bu ste /
translated: In order, they are the jewel crest, jewel, horse eye, gold, makara, gold, hoof, jewel, hoof, gold, and the parapet.🔽They are one eighth, one eighth, one twelfth, one fourth, one eighth, one fourth, one twelfth, one eighth, one twelfth, one fourth,

original: sgo'i brgyad cha dang / brgyad cha dang / bcu gnyis cha dang / nyi shu rtsa bzhi cha dang / brgyad cha dang / nyi shu rtsa bzhi cha dang / bcu gnyis cha dang / brgyad cha dang / bcu gnyis cha dang / nyi shu rtsa bzhi cha dang /
analyzed: sgo'i brgyad cha dang / brgyad cha dang / bcu gnyis cha dang / nyi shu rtsa bzhi cha dang / brgyad cha dang / nyi shu rtsa bzhi cha dang / bcu gnyis cha dang / brgyad cha dang / bcu gnyis cha dang / nyi shu rtsa bzhi cha dang /
translated: and one eighth of the height of the gate.

original: brgyad cha'o // rin chen shar bu rin chen gnas dang gser //
analyzed: brgyad cha'o // rin chen shar bu rin chen gnas dang gser //
translated: The jewel crest, jewel base, and gold,

original: chu srin de nas gser gyi gnas dang ni //
analyzed: chu srin de nas gser gyi gnas dang ni //
translated: the makara, then the gold base,

original: rin chen gnas dang gser dang mda' yab ste //
analyzed: rin chen gnas dang gser dang mda' yab ste //
translated: the jewel base, gold, and the parapet,

original: gnas rnams cha ni bcu gnyis cha ru 'gyur //
analyzed: gnas rnams cha ni bcu gnyis cha ru 'gyur //
translated: are the twelve parts of the base.

original: gser gyi rnam grangs sgo yi nyer bzhi cha //
analyzed: gser gyi rnam grangs sgo yi nyer bzhi cha //
translated: The gold is one fourth of the gate,

original: snam bu lhag ma sgo yi brgyad cha yin //
analyzed: snam bu lhag ma sgo yi brgyad cha yin //
translated: and the remaining ledges are one eighth of the gate.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'di rnams kyi rgya'i tshad brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi rgya'i tshad brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now the measurements of these [walls] will be described.

original: tshangs thig gi g-yas dang g-yon du cha chung phyed dang lnga dor bar snam bu dang po ni cha chung phyed dang gsum pa'o //
analyzed: tshangs thig gi g-yas dang g-yon du cha chung phyed dang lnga dor bar snam bu dang po ni cha chung phyed dang gsum pa'o //
translated: The first wall, which is half a cubit and three finger breadths, is five half-cubits to the right and left of the Brahma line.

original: de'i steng gi thig dang po ni cha chung phyed dang bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng gi thig dang po ni cha chung phyed dang bzhi pa'o //
translated: The first line above that is four finger breadths and a half-cubit.

original: cha chung lnga dor bar gnyis pa dang gsum pa ste cha chung gsum pa'o //
analyzed: cha chung lnga dor bar gnyis pa dang gsum pa ste cha chung gsum pa'o //
translated: The second and third [walls] are five cubits, three finger breadths.

original: cha chung bzhi dor bar bzhi pa cha chung gsum mo //
analyzed: cha chung bzhi dor bar bzhi pa cha chung gsum mo //
translated: The fourth [wall] is three finger breadths and four cubits.

original: cha chung phyed dang bzhi dor bar lnga pa cha chung phyed dang bzhi'o //
analyzed: cha chung phyed dang bzhi dor bar lnga pa cha chung phyed dang bzhi'o //
translated: The fifth [wall] is four finger breadths and four and a half cubits.

original: cha chung gsum dor bar drug pa ni cha chung lnga pa'o ;
analyzed: cha chung gsum dor bar drug pa ni cha chung lnga pa'o ;
translated: The sixth [wall] is five cubits and three finger breadths.

original: / bdun pa la sogs pa gsum ni cha chung brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: / bdun pa la sogs pa gsum ni cha chung brgyad pa'o //
translated: The three [walls] beginning with the seventh are eight cubits.

original: bcu pa ni cha chung bdun pa'o //
analyzed: bcu pa ni cha chung bdun pa'o //

original: bcu gcig pa ni cha chung drug pa'o //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa ni cha chung drug pa'o //

original: snam bu rnams so so'i phyi'i mthar thig gcig gyen du ji ltar rigs par ro //
analyzed: snam bu rnams so so'i phyi'i mthar thig gcig gyen du ji ltar rigs par ro //
translated: One line is drawn upwards at the outer edge of each wall, as appropriate.

original: nang gi mthar yang ste thig dang po ni cha chung phyed dor nas gyen du 'greng ba'o ;
analyzed: nang gi mthar yang ste thig dang po ni cha chung phyed dor nas gyen du 'greng ba'o ;

original: /'di nyid ni thig gzhan dang 'brel pas kyog po gcig tu mthong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: /'di nyid ni thig gzhan dang 'brel pas kyog po gcig tu mthong bar 'gyur te /
translated: This is connected to the other lines, so it appears as a single curve.

original: ji ltar mdzes par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar mdzes par bya'o //
translated: It should be made as beautiful as possible.

original: 'di'i nang du rin po che la sogs pa bri ba'i don du cha chung phyed dor te /
analyzed: 'di'i nang du rin po che la sogs pa bri ba'i don du cha chung phyed dor te /
translated: For the purpose of drawing the jewels and so forth inside this, half a small unit is omitted.

original: de kho na bzhin du thig kyog po gcig go //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du thig kyog po gcig go //
translated: In the same way, there is a single curved line.

original: 'ga' zhig ni /🔽de la rgyar ni cha chen po //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ni / de la rgyar ni cha chen po //
translated: Some say:🔽In width, the jewel ledge is

original: bzhi yis nor bu'i snam bu'o //
analyzed: bzhi yis nor bu'i snam bu'o //
translated: four large units.

original: de bzhin rta mig bcad pa dang // rang gi mtshan mas brgyan pa ste //🔽cha chen phyed dang bzhi pa ni //
analyzed: de bzhin rta mig bcad pa dang // rang gi mtshan mas brgyan pa ste // cha chen phyed dang bzhi pa ni //
translated: Likewise, the horse head ledge is cut and adorned with its own sign.🔽The jewel ledge is half a large unit.

original: rin chen shar bu gser de bzhin //🔽cha ni chen po gsum nyid kyis //
analyzed: rin chen shar bu gser de bzhin // cha ni chen po gsum nyid kyis //

original: chu srin dang ni mda' yab po //
analyzed: chu srin dang ni mda' yab po //
translated: The crocodile and arrow ledge are three large units.

original: zhes smra'o // 'dod pa de la bar gyi cha chung rnams la rin chen shar bu la sogs @26b pa med na ;
analyzed: zhes smra'o // 'dod pa de la bar gyi cha chung rnams la rin chen shar bu la sogs @26b pa med na ;
translated: If there are no jewel ledges and so forth in the intermediate small units,

analyzed: rin chen shar bu'i snam bu cha chung bcu drug ces pa la sogs pa brjod pa ji ltar rigs zhes dpyad par bya'o //
translated: The sixteen small units of the jeweled cornice, and so forth, should be analyzed as appropriate.

original: rta babs kyi steng du sgo ched gcig gi tshangs thig la chu chung gnyis pa'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: rta babs kyi steng du sgo ched gcig gi tshangs thig la chu chung gnyis pa'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: Above the archways, on the line of the Brahmā line of a single-doored [mandala], is the wheel of two small units.

original: de'i gdan ni mda' yab kyi snam bu'o //
analyzed: de'i gdan ni mda' yab kyi snam bu'o //

original: de'i glo dag tu sngon bzhin ri dags dang ri dags mo'o //
analyzed: de'i glo dag tu sngon bzhin ri dags dang ri dags mo'o //

analyzed: de dag gi mjug ma'i pha rol tu mda' yab la gnas shing /
translated: Beyond their tails, on the ledge,

translated: are two white parasols, with a half-moon, jewel, and vajra-peak ornament, with a handle of three and a half small units, and a fringe of cloth at the end, with a lining of two small units.

analyzed: kha cig tu ni dmar po dar dpyangs gnyis 'phyang ba'o //
translated: In some [texts], they are red, with two streamers hanging down.

original: de'i steng yu ba bzhi pa'i chad //
analyzed: de'i steng yu ba bzhi pa'i chad //

original: gdugs g-yog dag kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: gdugs g-yog dag kyang de bzhin no //

original: zhes ni gzhan zer ro //
analyzed: zhes ni gzhan zer ro //

original: kha cig ni gdugs cha chung drug pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: kha cig ni gdugs cha chung drug pa'o zhes so //

original: mda' yab mtha' ma'i steng du cha chung gcig pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan no //
analyzed: mda' yab mtha' ma'i steng du cha chung gcig pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan no //
translated: The victory banner and flag are one small unit above the outer rim.

original: 'khor lo las phyir dos su cha chung gnyis pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i ra ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo las phyir dos su cha chung gnyis pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i ra ste /
translated: The vajra cross is two small units outside the wheel.

original: 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi bar bar rnams su yang mthong bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi bar bar rnams su yang mthong bzhin pa'o //
translated: It is also seen between the spokes of the wheel.

original: de'i phyi rol gyi phreng ba gnyis kyi snam bu dag ni cha chung gcig pa dag gam /🔽gnyis pa dag go //
analyzed: de'i phyi rol gyi phreng ba gnyis kyi snam bu dag ni cha chung gcig pa dag gam / gnyis pa dag go //
translated: The two garlands outside that are one small unit or two small units.

original: 'od kyi phreng ba ni cha chung gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: 'od kyi phreng ba ni cha chung gnyis pa'o //
translated: The garland of light is two small units.

original: de ltar yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las /
analyzed: de ltar yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las /
translated: Thus the Vajradaka Tantra states:

original: phyi rol 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: phyi rol 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni //
translated: The outer circle of light

original: tshon gyi sa yi nyis 'gyur tshad //
analyzed: tshon gyi sa yi nyis 'gyur tshad //
translated: is the measure of two finger breadths of the colored sand.

original: khor yug de yi phyi rol du //🔽shing sogs dur khrod brgyad po yin //
analyzed: khor yug de yi phyi rol du // shing sogs dur khrod brgyad po yin //
translated: Outside of that is the outer ring

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: with the eight charnel grounds such as the tree and so forth.

original: dur khrod rnams ni dur khrod na gnas pa'i lha rnams kho na la yod kyi gzhan rnams la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dur khrod rnams ni dur khrod na gnas pa'i lha rnams kho na la yod kyi gzhan rnams la ni ma yin no //
translated: The charnel grounds are only for those deities who dwell in the charnel grounds, not for others.

original: skal pa dang mi ldan pa 'dus pa ni de rnams kyang rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du mi bri'o //
analyzed: skal pa dang mi ldan pa 'dus pa ni de rnams kyang rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du mi bri'o //
translated: Those who are not fortunate enough to assemble should not draw the maṇḍala of colored powders.

original: gzhan du 'od zer gyi snam bu cha chung bzhi par gsungs so //
analyzed: gzhan du 'od zer gyi snam bu cha chung bzhi par gsungs so //
translated: In other [texts], a four-square light-ray platform is taught.

original: kha cig tu ni bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: kha cig tu ni bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la //
translated: In some [texts], in the maṇḍala of Cakrasaṃvara,

original: rdo rje padma 'khor lo'i gzugs //
analyzed: rdo rje padma 'khor lo'i gzugs //
translated: the forms of vajra, lotus, and wheel

original: ra ba gsum yang dgod par bya //
analyzed: ra ba gsum yang dgod par bya //
translated: are arranged as the three enclosures.

original: zhes pa 'dis rdo rje phreng ba las phyi rol du padma dang 'khor lo'i phreng ba dag gsungs so //🔽zlum po bskor ba'i don du thig skud mtho gang la sogs pa lhag par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis rdo rje phreng ba las phyi rol du padma dang 'khor lo'i phreng ba dag gsungs so // zlum po bskor ba'i don du thig skud mtho gang la sogs pa lhag par bya'o //
translated: By this, the Vajra Garland teaches outside [the maṇḍala] the garlands of lotus and wheel.🔽For the purpose of drawing a circle, the chalk line should be extended one cubit or more.

original: thig skud brkyang bas kyang zlum po'i thig bya'o //
analyzed: thig skud brkyang bas kyang zlum po'i thig bya'o //
translated: Also, a circular line should be made with an extended chalk line.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur du ring bar gsungs pa ni bri bya'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs rdo rje dang de'i rten gyi lte ba'i @27a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur du ring bar gsungs pa ni bri bya'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs rdo rje dang de'i rten gyi lte ba'i @27a * //
translated: The Bhagavat has said that the mandala should be twice as long, which refers to the mandala to be drawn, from the center of the vajra cross and its base up to the outer edge.

original: mtha' ma mnyam pa tshun chad rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang dang byi mnyam par mtshon pa ste 'di ni phyogs gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' ma mnyam pa tshun chad rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang dang byi mnyam par mtshon pa ste 'di ni phyogs gnyis pa'o //
translated: The inner part of the basic mandala is equal to the outer part. This is the second position.

original: klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis ni phyogs dang po nyid bsngags so //
analyzed: klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis ni phyogs dang po nyid bsngags so //
translated: The venerable Nagarjuna praises the first position itself.🔽He says:

original: des ni sgo khyud dang 'gram dag gi tshad mnyam pa dang / bum pa ka ba'i steng gnas pa'i //
analyzed: des ni sgo khyud dang 'gram dag gi tshad mnyam pa dang / bum pa ka ba'i steng gnas pa'i //

original: rta babs sgo las sum 'gyur dang // zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rta babs sgo las sum 'gyur dang // zhes gsungs so //

original: de ltar na rta babs ni sgo las ngos su sum 'gyur du mi 'gyur te bzhi 'gyur du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na rta babs ni sgo las ngos su sum 'gyur du mi 'gyur te bzhi 'gyur du 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the pediments are not three times the size of the door from the side, but four times.

original: de'i phyir de ni dbangs su sum 'gyur nyid du bzhed do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni dbangs su sum 'gyur nyid du bzhed do //
translated: Therefore, he accepts that the pediments are three times the size from the top.

original: kun tu stegs bu sgo yi phyed //
analyzed: kun tu stegs bu sgo yi phyed //
translated: The platforms are half the size of the door.

original: 'gram dang logs kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: 'gram dang logs kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The sides and walls are the same.

original: zhes pa'i lung las /
analyzed: zhes pa'i lung las /
translated: In this passage,

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gram pa ni sgo'i phyed du yang gsungs la /

analyzed: ngos su rta babs sgo'i sum 'gyur gyi phyogs kyang ngo //

analyzed: de ltar phyogs gnyis ka yang kho bos bshad do //
translated: Thus, both sides are explained by me.

original: phyogs gnyis pa la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor las padma'i ge sar gyi zlum po'i thig tshun chad kyi dkyil 'khor du nyis 'gyur du brjod do ;
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor las padma'i ge sar gyi zlum po'i thig tshun chad kyi dkyil 'khor du nyis 'gyur du brjod do ;
translated: In the second position, the mandala is said to be twice the size of the mandala of the center, up to the circle of the stamens of the lotus.

original: / phyogs dang po la ni dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor dang bcas pa las 'od kyi phreng ba'i bar nyis 'gyur du'o //
analyzed: / phyogs dang po la ni dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor dang bcas pa las 'od kyi phreng ba'i bar nyis 'gyur du'o //
translated: In the first position, the central mandala together with its retinue is twice the size up to the garland of light.

original: rta babs kyi ka ba las phyi rol padma'i ge sar zlum po'i thig las tshu rol cha chung bcu bzhi pa'o zhes pa ni phyogs gnyis ka dang yang mi mthun pas spangs so //
analyzed: rta babs kyi ka ba las phyi rol padma'i ge sar zlum po'i thig las tshu rol cha chung bcu bzhi pa'o zhes pa ni phyogs gnyis ka dang yang mi mthun pas spangs so //
translated: The fourteen small units outside the pillars of the pediment from the circle of the stamens of the lotus are rejected because they are not consistent with either position.

analyzed: 'dir sgo dang sgo khyud kyi mtshams su cha chung gcig pa la zla tshos la gnas pa'i rin po che dmar po'am /
translated: Here, at the junction of the gate and the gate enclosure, there is a red jewel residing in the moon on one small unit.

analyzed: ser po'am / ljang gu'am /
translated: green, or

analyzed: nag po yang rung ste / steng du rdo rje phyed pas mtshan pa'am /
translated: black.🔽It is marked with a half-vajra above,

analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rjes mtshan pa'o //
translated: or with a complete vajra.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus it is said:🔽On the outer corners of the colored

original: tshon gyi sa las phyi yi zur //
analyzed: tshon gyi sa las phyi yi zur //
translated: ground,

original: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su //
analyzed: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su //
translated: at the doors and in the corners of the door-jambs,

original: zla ba rin chen rdo rjes mtshan //
analyzed: zla ba rin chen rdo rjes mtshan //
translated: there are moon-discs marked with jewels and vajras,

original: kun nas yongs su 'bar ba yin //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: kun nas yongs su 'bar ba yin // zhes gsungs so //
translated: all blazing with light.

original: gzhan du yang /
analyzed: gzhan du yang /
translated: And also:

analyzed: stegs bu'i phyi dang nang gi zur rnams su // zla ba nyi ma rin chen rdo rje dag //
translated: On the outer and inner corners of the platform,🔽there are moon-discs, sun-discs, jewels, and vajras,

analyzed: rdo rjes mtshan pa'am rin chen gcig po ni //
translated: marked with vajras or just jewels,

original: mkhas pa rnams kyis rim bzhin yang dag bri //
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams kyis rim bzhin yang dag bri //
translated: which the wise should draw in order.

original: zhes so // rta babs kyi ka ba rnams ni stegs bu gru bzhi pa la gnas pa'i bum pa la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // rta babs kyi ka ba rnams ni stegs bu gru bzhi pa la gnas pa'i bum pa la gnas pa'o //
translated: The pillars of the archways rest on vases located on the four corners of the platform.

original: de ltar yang /🔽chu srin kha nas chu srin bar //🔽rta babs sgo las sum 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar yang / chu srin kha nas chu srin bar // rta babs sgo las sum 'gyur ro //

analyzed: stegs bu bum pa las byung ba'i //
translated: water flows into vases located on the platform.

original: rta babs ka ba drang por bya //
analyzed: rta babs ka ba drang por bya //
translated: The pillars of the gateways are straight.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de rnams kyi rtsa ba dang rtse mo la nor bus @27b spras pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rtsa ba dang rtse mo la nor bus @27b spras pa'o //
translated: They are adorned with jewels at the base and top.

original: dbus su glang po che'i steng du dpung ba la bteg pa'i seng ge'o //
analyzed: dbus su glang po che'i steng du dpung ba la bteg pa'i seng ge'o //
translated: In the center, on top of an elephant, is a lion raised on its hind legs.

original: rta babs kyi gdung nas dang nge med pa'i phyogs la rin chen shar bu'i snam bu nas 'phyad ba'i rin po che'i pa tra 'phro ba las ji ltar mdzes par dbyangs ba'i kha dog dmar po dang ser po la sogs pa'am sna tshogs pa'i dar dbyangs dang ;

translated: From the beams of the gateways, in the direction without a pillar, there is a jeweled streamer that hangs down from the jeweled garland ledge. From that, jeweled tassels hang down in a beautiful way. They are red, yellow, and so forth, or of various colors.

original: rin po che'i yu ba can gyi rnga yab rnams so //
analyzed: rin po che'i yu ba can gyi rnga yab rnams so //
translated: There are jeweled banners and yak-tail fans.

original: kha gcig tu ni dar dbyangs kyi snam bu la glang po che'i steng du sang ge'i kha nas rin po che'i do shal 'phyang ba dang / ka ba'i dbus su me long zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: kha gcig tu ni dar dbyangs kyi snam bu la glang po che'i steng du sang ge'i kha nas rin po che'i do shal 'phyang ba dang / ka ba'i dbus su me long zhes gsungs so //
translated: Some say that on the streamer ledge, on top of an elephant, a lion's mouth hangs down with a jeweled necklace, and in the center of the pillar is a mirror.

original: rin po che'i snam bu la ni zur gsum dang / thig le dang / gru bzhi dang / zlum po rnams rim pas rin po che'i bcings pa ni ka ba so so'i gzhogs su'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i snam bu la ni zur gsum dang / thig le dang / gru bzhi dang / zlum po rnams rim pas rin po che'i bcings pa ni ka ba so so'i gzhogs su'o //
translated: On the jeweled ledges, there are half-moons, dots, squares, and circles, respectively. The jeweled bindings are on the sides of each pillar.

original: dra ba'i snam bu la gser gyi ske rags bzhi'i ngos su chu srin ma ka ra'i kha nas byung ba'i mu tig gi do shal skud pa dmar po las brgyus shing /

translated: On the net ledges, on the sides of the four golden girdles, there are pearl garlands emerging from the mouths of makara water-spouts. They are strung on red cords.

original: glo gnyis dang / steng dang 'og tu gser gyis bsdams pa'i nor bu dbus na yod pa dang / do shal gyi glo gnyis su do shal phyed pa cung zad thung bar 'phyang pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba drang zhing rtse mo gser gyis bsdams pa'i nor bu sbom po dang ldan pas mdzes pa dang /
analyzed: glo gnyis dang / steng dang 'og tu gser gyis bsdams pa'i nor bu dbus na yod pa dang / do shal gyi glo gnyis su do shal phyed pa cung zad thung bar 'phyang pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba drang zhing rtse mo gser gyis bsdams pa'i nor bu sbom po dang ldan pas mdzes pa dang /
translated: On the two sides, above and below, there are golden-bound jewels in the center, and on the two sides of the garlands there are half-garlands hanging a little shorter. They are beautified by jeweled garlands with straight strings and large golden-bound jewels at the tips.

original: kha cig tu ni rin po che'i yu ba can gyi rnga yab dang / dril bu'i mthar rnga yab 'phyang ba'o //
analyzed: kha cig tu ni rin po che'i yu ba can gyi rnga yab dang / dril bu'i mthar rnga yab 'phyang ba'o //
translated: In some places, there are jeweled-handled yak-tail fans and yak-tail tassels hanging from the ends of the bells.

original: kha cig tu ni dra ba phyed pa'i glo gnyis su yid du 'ong ba'i me tog phreng ba'i dra ba phyed pa 'phyang zhing /
analyzed: kha cig tu ni dra ba phyed pa'i glo gnyis su yid du 'ong ba'i me tog phreng ba'i dra ba phyed pa 'phyang zhing /
translated: In some places, on both sides of the half-garland, there hang beautiful garlands of flowers.

original: de'i glor gos sna tshogs pa'i dra ba phyed pa'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i glor gos sna tshogs pa'i dra ba phyed pa'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: In the other places, there are half-garlands of various cloths.

original: gzhan ni grva rnams su yid du 'ong ba'i me tog gi phreng ba'i ngo shal phyed pa dang / dar gyi chun po'i do shal rnams so zhe'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni grva rnams su yid du 'ong ba'i me tog gi phreng ba'i ngo shal phyed pa dang / dar gyi chun po'i do shal rnams so zhe'o //
translated: Others say that in the corners there are half-garlands of beautiful flower garlands and silk tassels.

original: do shal gyi nang du kha cig tu ni padma la zla tshes dang rdo rje phyed bas mtshan pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: do shal gyi nang du kha cig tu ni padma la zla tshes dang rdo rje phyed bas mtshan pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: In the middle of the garlands, in some places there are sun mandalas marked with crescents and vajra-forks on lotuses.

original: kha cig tu ni rin po che'o //
analyzed: kha cig tu ni rin po che'o //
translated: In some places there are jewels.

original: kha cig tu ni padma la gnas pa'i rdo rje'o //🔽phyogs rnams su padma'i 'dab ma phyed pa'i dbyibs can gyi mda' yab rnams la gser gyi bum pa la gnas pa'am /
analyzed: kha cig tu ni padma la gnas pa'i rdo rje'o // phyogs rnams su padma'i 'dab ma phyed pa'i dbyibs can gyi mda' yab rnams la gser gyi bum pa la gnas pa'am /
translated: In some places there are vajras on lotuses.

original: rin po che'i bum pa la gnas pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan brgyad de /
analyzed: rin po che'i bum pa la gnas pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan brgyad de /
translated: In the directions, on the parapets shaped like half lotus petals, there are eight victory banners and flags on golden vases or jeweled vases.

original: zla tshes dang rin po che dang / rdo rje dang ldan pa'i rtse mo can rin po che'i dbyug pa la bcings zhing dril bu 'khrol ba bcings pa'i dar lce gsum pa rtse mo la ri dags kyi rgyal po dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po dang klu za ba dang /
analyzed: zla tshes dang rin po che dang / rdo rje dang ldan pa'i rtse mo can rin po che'i dbyug pa la bcings zhing dril bu 'khrol ba bcings pa'i dar lce gsum pa rtse mo la ri dags kyi rgyal po dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po dang klu za ba dang /
translated: The top of the victory banner is bound with a jeweled staff, which has a jeweled top, a moon and sun, a jewel, and a vajra. It has three banner tips that are bound with a ringing bell. The tips are marked with a king of beasts, a king of geese, and a nāga eating a snake.

original: nya sbu rgyas pa dang chu srin gyis mtshan pa /
analyzed: nya sbu rgyas pa dang chu srin gyis mtshan pa /
translated: They are marked with a fish with scales, and a makara.

original: rlung gis bskyod pas sum @28a * //🔽khugs su 'khyog cing 'gying ba'i cha byad can /
analyzed: rlung gis bskyod pas sum @28a * // khugs su 'khyog cing 'gying ba'i cha byad can /
translated: The wind moves them, and they are bent in three places.🔽They have the appearance of swaying.

original: dril chung gi sgra sgrogs pas sil sil zer ba rnga yab dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: dril chung gi sgra sgrogs pas sil sil zer ba rnga yab dang bcas pa'o //
translated: They ring with the sound of small bells, and they have yak-tail whisks.

original: ba dan rnams kyang de bzhin de //
analyzed: ba dan rnams kyang de bzhin de //
translated: The banners are also like that.

original: ri dags la sogs pa'i mtshan ma gzhan dang ni bral pa'o //
analyzed: ri dags la sogs pa'i mtshan ma gzhan dang ni bral pa'o //
translated: They are not marked with other things, such as beasts.

original: grva bzhir mnga' yab kyi steng du gdugs bzhi'o //
analyzed: grva bzhir mnga' yab kyi steng du gdugs bzhi'o //
translated: In the four corners, there are four parasols above the yak-tail whisks.

original: rta babs la rnam par bkra ba'i bla re dang do shal dang do shal phyed pa'o //
analyzed: rta babs la rnam par bkra ba'i bla re dang do shal dang do shal phyed pa'o //
translated: The gateways have variegated canopies, necklaces, and half-necklaces.

original: rta mig dang ba dan gyi mtha' rnams su rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams te ji ltar mdzes par ro //
analyzed: rta mig dang ba dan gyi mtha' rnams su rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams te ji ltar mdzes par ro //
translated: At the corners of the horse-head and the banner, there are victory banners and flags, as is beautiful.

original: seng ge dang / seng ge rkang pa brgyad pa dang / ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / mi'am ci dang / mi'am ci mo rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: seng ge dang / seng ge rkang pa brgyad pa dang / ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / mi'am ci dang / mi'am ci mo rnams kyang ngo //
translated: There are also lions, eight-footed lions, geese, peacocks, kinnaras, and kinnarīs.

original: rta babs kyi gzhogs rnams su shin tu mi ring bar bum pa bzang po las skyes pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing rnams te /
analyzed: rta babs kyi gzhogs rnams su shin tu mi ring bar bum pa bzang po las skyes pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing rnams te /
translated: On the sides of the gateways, there are wish-fulfilling trees growing from excellent vases, not too tall.

original: glang po che la sogs pa rin po che bdun dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: glang po che la sogs pa rin po che bdun dang ldan pa'o //
translated: They are endowed with the seven jewels such as the elephant.

original: bar bar du ni grub thob rnams dang / me tog gi phreng ba bzung ba sprin gyi sbubs las byung ba'i lha'i lus can rnams so //
analyzed: bar bar du ni grub thob rnams dang / me tog gi phreng ba bzung ba sprin gyi sbubs las byung ba'i lha'i lus can rnams so //
translated: In between are accomplished ones and those with divine bodies born from the wombs of clouds, holding flower garlands.

original: de lta bu 'di ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las phyi rol du thig gdab cing bri ba'i rim pa ste dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi thun mong ngo //
analyzed: de lta bu 'di ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las phyi rol du thig gdab cing bri ba'i rim pa ste dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi thun mong ngo //
translated: This is the procedure for laying out and drawing outside the main maṇḍala. It is common to all maṇḍalas.

original: nang du ni bye brag tu brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: nang du ni bye brag tu brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the inner [part] should be described.

original: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du sgo'i tshad du lha snam dor nas ngos thig gcig zur thig gnyis kyi bar du'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du sgo'i tshad du lha snam dor nas ngos thig gcig zur thig gnyis kyi bar du'o //
translated: Inside the basic lines, having omitted the space for the deities in the measure of the door, [draw] between the inner line and the two corner lines.

original: de'i nang du gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa dgong pa'i don du sgo /
analyzed: de'i nang du gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa dgong pa'i don du sgo /
translated: Inside that, in order to omit the space for Rūpavajrā and so forth, [draw] the door.

original: tshad dor nas tshangs pa'i lte ba la gnas pa'i thig skud kyis tshangs pa'am dbang ldan gyi thig nas bzung nas /
analyzed: tshad dor nas tshangs pa'i lte ba la gnas pa'i thig skud kyis tshangs pa'am dbang ldan gyi thig nas bzung nas /
translated: Having omitted the measure, [draw] the line of thread located at the navel of Brahmā, beginning from the line of Brahmā or Indra.

original: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams kyi zlum po'i thig dang po'o //
analyzed: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams kyi zlum po'i thig dang po'o //
translated: The first circle line is at the center of the mandala.

original: de'i nang du rdo rje phreng ba'i cha chung spangs nas de ltar zlum po'i thig gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de'i nang du rdo rje phreng ba'i cha chung spangs nas de ltar zlum po'i thig gnyis pa'o //
translated: Inside that, having omitted one small unit of the vajra garland, [draw] the second circle line.

original: de nas phyogs gzhan gyi zlum po'i thig gi bar du tshangs thig gi g-yas phyogs su thig gnyis te /
analyzed: de nas phyogs gzhan gyi zlum po'i thig gi bar du tshangs thig gi g-yas phyogs su thig gnyis te /
translated: Then, up to the other side circle line, there are two lines to the right of the Brahmā line.

original: dad po ni cha chung gnyis dor bar ro //
analyzed: dad po ni cha chung gnyis dor bar ro //
translated: The first is two small units away.

original: gnyis pa ni gtso bo'i mtshan ma dang ka ba'i cha chung dor nas so //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni gtso bo'i mtshan ma dang ka ba'i cha chung dor nas so //
translated: The second is three small units away, having omitted one small unit of the principal sign and one small unit of the pillar.

original: de ltar g-yon du'o //
analyzed: de ltar g-yon du'o //
translated: In that way, [draw] to the left.

original: 'dir lhor gnas te byang du phyogs pas shar phyogs su ka ba'i thig gdab bo //🔽byang du gnas te lhor phyogs pas nub tu'o //
analyzed: 'dir lhor gnas te byang du phyogs pas shar phyogs su ka ba'i thig gdab bo // byang du gnas te lhor phyogs pas nub tu'o //
translated: Here, standing in the south and facing north, one should lay down the line in the east.🔽Standing in the north and facing south, (one should lay down the line) in the west.

original: nub tu gnas te shar du phyogs pas byang du'o //
analyzed: nub tu gnas te shar du phyogs pas byang du'o //
translated: Standing in the west and facing east, (one should lay down the line) in the north.

original: shar du gnas te nub tu phyogs pas lhor ro //
analyzed: shar du gnas te nub tu phyogs pas lhor ro //
translated: Standing in the east and facing west, (one should lay down the line) in the south.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gror ni zlum po'i thig dang po las phyir 'od kyi phreng ba'i don du cha chung gcig spangs par zlum po'i thig gcig gsungs so //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gror ni zlum po'i thig dang po las phyir 'od kyi phreng ba'i don du cha chung gcig spangs par zlum po'i thig gcig gsungs so //
translated: In the Vajradaka, one should leave out one small unit from the first circular line for the sake of the garland of light, and draw a second circular line.

original: de nas tshangs thig dang zur thig phyi bas @28b re mig dgur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas tshangs thig dang zur thig phyi bas @28b re mig dgur 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, by drawing the lines of the corners and the line of Brahma, (the mandala) becomes divided into nine compartments.

original: gzhan yang tshangs thig dang gtso bo'i gnas kyi snam bu'i nang gi thig rnams ni dbyi bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang tshangs thig dang gtso bo'i gnas kyi snam bu'i nang gi thig rnams ni dbyi bar bya'o //
translated: Moreover, the lines inside the platform of the principal deity and the line of Brahma should be erased.

original: lha'i gnas dang tshon khyad par du bya ba'i don du zur thig dang lha snam gyi thig rnams ni gzhag cing rdul tshon gdab pa nyid kyis g-yogs par bya'o //
analyzed: lha'i gnas dang tshon khyad par du bya ba'i don du zur thig dang lha snam gyi thig rnams ni gzhag cing rdul tshon gdab pa nyid kyis g-yogs par bya'o //
translated: For the sake of the location of the deities and the special colors, the lines of the corners and the lines of the platforms of the deities should be left, and covered by just laying down the colored powders.

original: 'dir gal te de ltar gdab pa las gzhan du gdab par 'dod na de'i tshe tshangs thig gi phyi rol du cha chung gnyis spangs par thig gcig go //
analyzed: 'dir gal te de ltar gdab pa las gzhan du gdab par 'dod na de'i tshe tshangs thig gi phyi rol du cha chung gnyis spangs par thig gcig go //
translated: If one wishes to cast the mandala in a different way than this, then at that time, one should cast a line two small units outside the Brahmā line.

original: de'i phyi rol du cha chung de re dor bar thig drug ste /
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du cha chung de re dor bar thig drug ste /
translated: Outside of that, one should cast six lines, each one small unit apart.

original: thig bdun ka yang gzhal yas khang gi mda' yab kyi thig gi bar du'o //
analyzed: thig bdun ka yang gzhal yas khang gi mda' yab kyi thig gi bar du'o //
translated: All seven lines are up to the line of the portico of the celestial mansion.

original: de la dkyil 'khor gyi brjod pa'i bdun gdab pa nyid btab nas sngar bzhin thig zlum po gsum byas te /
analyzed: de la dkyil 'khor gyi brjod pa'i bdun gdab pa nyid btab nas sngar bzhin thig zlum po gsum byas te /
translated: Having cast the seven lines of the mandala as described, one should make three circular lines as before.

original: sngon gyi thig gdab pa'i rim pas gnas pa'i thig rnams bzhag ste gzhan rnams dbyi bar bya'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi thig gdab pa'i rim pas gnas pa'i thig rnams bzhag ste gzhan rnams dbyi bar bya'o //
translated: Having set the lines that abide by the sequence of the previous line casting, the others should be erased.

original: 'di gnyis ka yang 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'o //
analyzed: 'di gnyis ka yang 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'o //
translated: Both of these are the line casting of the Mañjuvajra mandala.

original: gtso bo gzhan dgod pa la yang 'di'o //🔽'dis ni / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //🔽rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: gtso bo gzhan dgod pa la yang 'di'o // 'dis ni / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa // rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan //
translated: This is also for setting out the other principals.🔽This is the four-doored square🔽adorned with four arched gateways.

original: thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
analyzed: thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
translated: It is endowed with four lines.

original: phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya //
analyzed: phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya //
translated: Lay out the outer maṇḍala.

original: de yi nang du dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: de yi nang du dkyil 'khor ni //
translated: Within that, the maṇḍala

original: dkyil 'khor brgyad ba lta bu yin //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor brgyad ba lta bu yin //
translated: is like an eight-part maṇḍala.

original: phyi yi 'khor lo'i phyed du ni //🔽kun nas yongs su zlum po'o //
analyzed: phyi yi 'khor lo'i phyed du ni // kun nas yongs su zlum po'o //
translated: The outer wheel is half🔽a complete circle.

original: 'khor lo ka ba la sogs spras //
analyzed: 'khor lo ka ba la sogs spras //
translated: It is adorned with pillars and so on,

original: rdo rje phreng bas bskor zhing mdzes //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng bas bskor zhing mdzes //
translated: surrounded by a vajra garland.

original: zhes pa dang / 'khor lo ka sogs thig rnams kyi //
analyzed: zhes pa dang / 'khor lo ka sogs thig rnams kyi //
translated: And: The lines of the wheel and so on

original: sa ni tshon gyi sa dang mnyam //
analyzed: sa ni tshon gyi sa dang mnyam //
translated: are the same level as the level of the colors.

original: zhes pa yang rnam par phye'o //
analyzed: zhes pa yang rnam par phye'o //
translated: This is also the division.

original: bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang gdab pa'i tshul 'di nyid do //
analyzed: bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang gdab pa'i tshul 'di nyid do //
translated: This very method of laying out the lines is also for the maṇḍala taught in the Concise Sādhana.

original: khyad par du zlum po'i thig gnyis pa'i nang du yang rdo rje phreng ba'i cha chung dor bar zlum po'i thig gsum mo //
analyzed: khyad par du zlum po'i thig gnyis pa'i nang du yang rdo rje phreng ba'i cha chung dor bar zlum po'i thig gsum mo //
translated: In particular, within the second circle, having left off a space of one small unit for the vajra garland, there are three circles.

original: zlum po dang po'i nang du ni 'od kyi phreng ba'o //
analyzed: zlum po dang po'i nang du ni 'od kyi phreng ba'o //
translated: Within the first circle, there is a garland of light.

original: zlum po'i thig dang po las phyi ngos su ni zlum po'i thig med do //
analyzed: zlum po'i thig dang po las phyi ngos su ni zlum po'i thig med do //
translated: Outside the first circle, there is no circle.

original: klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said by Nāgabodhi:

original: dbus kyi 'khor lo yi ni tshad //
analyzed: dbus kyi 'khor lo yi ni tshad //
translated: The size of the central wheel

original: rtsa ba'i thig gi phyed kyis so ;
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig gi phyed kyis so ;
translated: is half the size of the basic lines.

original: / zhes dang / tshangs las stegs bu tsam du 'gyur //🔽stegs bu phyed du gnyis pa ste //
analyzed: / zhes dang / tshangs las stegs bu tsam du 'gyur // stegs bu phyed du gnyis pa ste //
translated: The platform is the same as the Brahma line.🔽The second is half the platform.

original: gsum pa stegs bu phyed dang gnyis //
analyzed: gsum pa stegs bu phyed dang gnyis //
translated: The third is one and a half platforms.

original: stegs bu'i phyed kyi gzhan yin te //🔽'od zer lnga yis rnam brgyan pa'i //
analyzed: stegs bu'i phyed kyi gzhan yin te // 'od zer lnga yis rnam brgyan pa'i //
translated: The other is half a platform.🔽The vajra garland is clearly drawn

original: rdo rje phreng ba gsal bar bya //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba gsal bar bya //
translated: adorned with five light rays.

original: nang gi 'khor lo'i phyi rol du //🔽thig bzhi mnyam @29a * //
analyzed: nang gi 'khor lo'i phyi rol du // thig bzhi mnyam @29a * //
translated: Outside the inner wheel,

original: par kun nas bri //🔽rdo rjes mtshan zhing legs mdzes ba'i //
analyzed: par kun nas bri // rdo rjes mtshan zhing legs mdzes ba'i //
translated: draw four lines equally all around.🔽Draw eight pillars inside

original: ka ba brgyad ni nang du bri //
analyzed: ka ba brgyad ni nang du bri //
translated: marked with vajras and very beautiful.

original: de nyid du ni re mig dgu //
analyzed: de nyid du ni re mig dgu //
translated: In that place, there are nine squares

original: rdo rje ka ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ka ba'i bar du'o //
translated: between the vajra pillars.

original: zhes so // dpal kha sbyor gyi rgyud du gsungs ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la /
analyzed: zhes so // dpal kha sbyor gyi rgyud du gsungs ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la /
translated: In the mandala of Vajrasattva taught in the glorious Compendium of Vajra Teachings Tantra,

original: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du cha chung gsum gyi bar spangs nas bar du cha chung phyed pa'i zlum po'i thig gnyis kyi dbus su chud pa'i 'khor lo'i phreng ba'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du cha chung gsum gyi bar spangs nas bar du cha chung phyed pa'i zlum po'i thig gnyis kyi dbus su chud pa'i 'khor lo'i phreng ba'o //
translated: Inside the basic lines, leaving a space of three small units, there are two half-unit circles, which contain the circle of wheels.

original: de'i nang du cha chung gsum dor nas bar du cha chung phyed pa'i thig zlum po gnyis kyi bar du chud pa'i padma'i phreng ba'o //
analyzed: de'i nang du cha chung gsum dor nas bar du cha chung phyed pa'i thig zlum po gnyis kyi bar du chud pa'i padma'i phreng ba'o //
translated: Inside that, leaving a space of three small units, there are two half-unit circles, which contain the circle of lotuses.

original: de'i nang du cha chung gsum dor te zlum po'i thig gi mtha' nas cha chung phyed kyi bar du ni 'od zer gyi phreng ba'o //
analyzed: de'i nang du cha chung gsum dor te zlum po'i thig gi mtha' nas cha chung phyed kyi bar du ni 'od zer gyi phreng ba'o //
translated: Inside that, leaving a space of three small units, from the edge of the circle to half a small unit, there is the circle of light rays.

original: de'i nang du cha chung phyed kyi bar gyi thig zlum po gnyis kyi nang du rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
analyzed: de'i nang du cha chung phyed kyi bar gyi thig zlum po gnyis kyi nang du rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
translated: Inside that, between two half-unit circles, there is the circle of vajras.

original: 'dir nang gi thig zlum po nas phyogs gzhan gyi zlum po'i thig gi par du tshangs pa'i g-yas logs su thig gnyis te /
analyzed: 'dir nang gi thig zlum po nas phyogs gzhan gyi zlum po'i thig gi par du tshangs pa'i g-yas logs su thig gnyis te /
translated: Here, from the inner circle to the other side of the circle, there are two lines to the right of Brahmā.

original: dang po ni cha chung phyed dang gnyis dor bar ro //
analyzed: dang po ni cha chung phyed dang gnyis dor bar ro //
translated: The first is left at one and a half small units.

original: gnyis pa ni gtso bo'i mtshan ma dang ka ba'i cha chung phyed dor nas so //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni gtso bo'i mtshan ma dang ka ba'i cha chung phyed dor nas so //
translated: The second is the sign of the principal deity and half a small unit of the pillar.

original: de ltar g-yon du yang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar g-yon du yang ngo //
translated: In the same way, on the left.

original: sngon bzhin tshangs thig la sogs pa dbyi'o zhes pa bye brag dang bcas pa gdab pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: sngon bzhin tshangs thig la sogs pa dbyi'o zhes pa bye brag dang bcas pa gdab pa'i tshul lo //
translated: As before, one should draw the Brahmā lines, etc.

original: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor du /
analyzed: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor du /
translated: In the maṇḍala of the Space-like dakini,

original: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du cha chung bzhi dor bar thig zlum po'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du cha chung bzhi dor bar thig zlum po'o //
translated: within the root lines, four small units are left out, and there is a circular line.

original: de nas dbus kyi cha chung dor bar gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de nas dbus kyi cha chung dor bar gnyis pa'o //
translated: Then, leaving out one small unit in the center, there is a second one.

original: de nas rdo rje phreng ba'i cha chung dor bar gsum pa'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje phreng ba'i cha chung dor bar gsum pa'o //
translated: Then, leaving out one small unit of the vajra garland, there is a third one.

original: de nas lha mo'i cha chung drug dor bar ngos kyi thig gcig ste zlum po la reg pa'o //
analyzed: de nas lha mo'i cha chung drug dor bar ngos kyi thig gcig ste zlum po la reg pa'o //
translated: Then, leaving out six small units of the goddess, there is one line on the side, touching the circle.

original: de nas ka ba dang gtso bo'i phyag mtshan gyi don du cha chung gcig dor nas de bzhin du gnyis pa'o zhes pa khyad par gyi thig go //
analyzed: de nas ka ba dang gtso bo'i phyag mtshan gyi don du cha chung gcig dor nas de bzhin du gnyis pa'o zhes pa khyad par gyi thig go //
translated: Then, leaving out one small unit for the pillar and the sign of the principal deity, there is a second one in the same way. This is the special line.

original: bcu bdun gyi bdag nyid dgyes pa'i rdo rje bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la /
analyzed: bcu bdun gyi bdag nyid dgyes pa'i rdo rje bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la /
translated: In the maṇḍala of the four Hevajras with a nature of seventeen,

original: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du tshangs pa dang zur thig rnams nyid de thig gzhan btab pa ni med do //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du tshangs pa dang zur thig rnams nyid de thig gzhan btab pa ni med do //
translated: Inside the basic lines, there are the Brahmā lines and the corner lines, but the other lines are not drawn.

original: tshangs pa'i thig las phyi ngos su thig zlum po bzhi'o //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i thig las phyi ngos su thig zlum po bzhi'o //
translated: Outside the Brahmā lines, there are four circular lines.

original: de la dang po ni lte ba yin te cha chung gcig gi brgyad chas lhag pa'i cha chung phyed dang gsum dor nas so //
analyzed: de la dang po ni lte ba yin te cha chung gcig gi brgyad chas lhag pa'i cha chung phyed dang gsum dor nas so //
translated: The first is the navel, which is one-and-a-half small units minus one-eighth of a small unit.

original: gnyis pa ni 'dab ma rnams kyi ste bzhi cha dang bcas pa'i cha chung lnga'i bar dor nas so //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni 'dab ma rnams kyi ste bzhi cha dang bcas pa'i cha chung lnga'i bar dor nas so //
translated: The second is the petals, which is five small units plus one-fourth of a small unit.

original: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung gcig gi brgyad cha dor nas kyang /
analyzed: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung gcig gi brgyad cha dor nas kyang /
translated: Outside of that, minus one-eighth of a small unit,

original: cha chung gcig dor bar gsum pa ste rdo rje'i phreng ba yin no //
analyzed: cha chung gcig dor bar gsum pa ste rdo rje'i phreng ba yin no //
translated: is the third, which is one small unit minus one-third, the vajra garland.

original: bzhi pa ni dbus kyi 'od zer gyi thig ste cha chung gcig dor nas so //
analyzed: bzhi pa ni dbus kyi 'od zer gyi thig ste cha chung gcig dor nas so //
translated: The fourth is the central light line, which is one small unit.

original: nyi shu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid @29b can dang ; bco lnga'i bdag nyid can bdag med ma dang / ku ru ku lle'i dkyil 'khor la yang de nyid do //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid @29b can dang ; bco lnga'i bdag nyid can bdag med ma dang / ku ru ku lle'i dkyil 'khor la yang de nyid do //
translated: The same is true for the Kurukullā maṇḍala, which has twenty-three goddesses, and for the Nairātmyā maṇḍala, which has fifteen goddesses.

original: rdo rje bdud rtse bzhi yang de ltar ro //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtse bzhi yang de ltar ro //
translated: The four vajra nectars are also like that.🔽The four vajras of Hevajra, which has nine parts, is as follows:

original: dgu'i bdag nyid can dgyes pa rdo rje bzhi'i ni tshangs thig las phyi ngos su lte ba'i ngon du cha chung lnga dor nas gser gyi thig zlum po gcig go //
analyzed: dgu'i bdag nyid can dgyes pa rdo rje bzhi'i ni tshangs thig las phyi ngos su lte ba'i ngon du cha chung lnga dor nas gser gyi thig zlum po gcig go //
translated: Outside the brahma line, having skipped five small units in front of the center, there is one round golden line.

original: de'i phyi ngos su 'dab ma'i don du cha chung bcu spangs par thig gcig go zhes pa khyad par ro //
analyzed: de'i phyi ngos su 'dab ma'i don du cha chung bcu spangs par thig gcig go zhes pa khyad par ro //
translated: Outside that, having skipped ten small units for the petals, there is one line.

original: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung gcig la bum pa rnams sam de la rdo rje'i phreng ba'o zhes pa kha cig go //
analyzed: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung gcig la bum pa rnams sam de la rdo rje'i phreng ba'o zhes pa kha cig go //
translated: Outside that, on one small unit, there are the vases or the vajra garland.

original: lnga'i bdag gnyis bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma chen mo'i dkyil 'khor yad de lta bu nyid do //
analyzed: lnga'i bdag gnyis bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma chen mo'i dkyil 'khor yad de lta bu nyid do //
translated: The mandala of the Bhagavatī Mahāmāyā has five parts.

original: dgu'i bdag nyis bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang de ltar ro //
analyzed: dgu'i bdag nyis bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang de ltar ro //
translated: The mandala of the Bhagavat Buddhakapāla also has nine parts.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la tshangs pa'i thig nas cha chung phyed dang gsum dor bar ge sar gyi thig zlum po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la tshangs pa'i thig nas cha chung phyed dang gsum dor bar ge sar gyi thig zlum po'o //
translated: In the mandala of Vajrahūṃkāra, having skipped one and a half small units from the brahma line, there is a round line of stamens.

original: de'i phyi ngos su 'dab ma'i don du cha chung lnga dor bar thig zlum po'o //
analyzed: de'i phyi ngos su 'dab ma'i don du cha chung lnga dor bar thig zlum po'o //
translated: On the outside of that, leaving five small units for the petals, draw a circle.

original: de nas cha chung dor bar phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su cha chung phyed dang brgyad pa'i 'dab ma brgyad de /
analyzed: de nas cha chung dor bar phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su cha chung phyed dang brgyad pa'i 'dab ma brgyad de /
translated: Then, leaving one small unit, in the directions and intermediate directions there are eight petals of four and a half small units each.

original: shar gyi padma las phyi rol tu padma cha chung gsum pa'o //
analyzed: shar gyi padma las phyi rol tu padma cha chung gsum pa'o //
translated: Outside the eastern lotus, there is a lotus of three small units.🔽And also in the west, it is the same.

original: nub kyi padma las kyang de bzhin no zhes pa gdab pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: nub kyi padma las kyang de bzhin no zhes pa gdab pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: This is the special way of drawing the lines.

original: bcom ldan 'das bde mchog dang rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor la rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du tshangs thig dang zur thig gnyis gnas pa la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bde mchog dang rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor la rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du tshangs thig dang zur thig gnyis gnas pa la /
translated: In the mandala of Bhagavat Cakrasaṃvara and Vajravārāhī, inside the primary lines, there are two lines: the Brahmā line and the corner lines.

original: tshangs thig les phyi ngos su cha chung gnyis dor nas thig gcig rtsa ba'i thig la thug par gdab bo //
analyzed: tshangs thig les phyi ngos su cha chung gnyis dor nas thig gcig rtsa ba'i thig la thug par gdab bo //
translated: Leaving two small units outside the Brahmā line, draw a line that touches the primary line.

original: zur thig gi g-yas dang g-yon du cha chung gnyis dor bar thig re re ste /
analyzed: zur thig gi g-yas dang g-yon du cha chung gnyis dor bar thig re re ste /
translated: To the right and left of the corner lines, leaving two small units, draw a line.

original: srid du lte ba'i glo gnyis pas sgo'i tshad bzhi bzhi'o //
analyzed: srid du lte ba'i glo gnyis pas sgo'i tshad bzhi bzhi'o //
translated: In length, the two sides of the navel are four units each, the measure of the door.

original: de nas tshangs thig dang zur thig gi phyi'i thig las phyi rol du cha chung gnyis dor bar thig dang po ste /
analyzed: de nas tshangs thig dang zur thig gi phyi'i thig las phyi rol du cha chung gnyis dor bar thig dang po ste /
translated: Then, two small units outside the line of the Brahmā line and the corner line is the first line.

original: tshangs thig dang zur thig dang de dag gi glo'i thig gi steng dag tu sgo'i tshad de /
analyzed: tshangs thig dang zur thig dang de dag gi glo'i thig gi steng dag tu sgo'i tshad de /
translated: On the Brahmā line, the corner line, and the lines of their extensions, the measure of the door is

original: thad kar logs dag tu cha chung gnyis gnyis kyi phyar ro //
analyzed: thad kar logs dag tu cha chung gnyis gnyis kyi phyar ro //
translated: two small units in each direction.

original: de'i phyi ngos su de ltar thig lnga'o //
analyzed: de'i phyi ngos su de ltar thig lnga'o //
translated: Outside of that, there are five lines in that way.

original: de bzhin du zur dang de dag gi 'gram gyi thig gi steng tu thig drug pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du zur dang de dag gi 'gram gyi thig gi steng tu thig drug pa yang ngo //
translated: Likewise, on the corner and the lines of its sides, there is also a sixth line.

original: de nas tshangs thig gi g-yas su dang po'i cha chung gcig gi mtha' nas phyung ste /
analyzed: de nas tshangs thig gi g-yas su dang po'i cha chung gcig gi mtha' nas phyung ste /
translated: Then, to the right of the Brahmā line, having extended from the end of the first small unit,

original: gnyis pa'i rtse mor song nas gsum pa'i cha chung gcig gi mthar zhugs te bzhi ba'i rtse mor sogs nas lnga ba'i cha chung gcig gi mthar zhugs te /
analyzed: gnyis pa'i rtse mor song nas gsum pa'i cha chung gcig gi mthar zhugs te bzhi ba'i rtse mor sogs nas lnga ba'i cha chung gcig gi mthar zhugs te /
translated: having gone to the tip of the second, having entered the end of the third small unit, having gone to the tip of the fourth, having entered the end of the fifth small unit,

original: drug ba'i rtse mor sod nas bdun pa'i cha chung gcig gi mthar zhugs pa'i thig kyog po gcig go //
analyzed: drug ba'i rtse mor sod nas bdun pa'i cha chung gcig gi mthar zhugs pa'i thig kyog po gcig go //
translated: having gone to the tip of the sixth, having entered the end of the seventh small unit, there is one crooked line.

original: 'di'i @30a * //🔽nang du cha chung phyed dor nas 'di lta bu'i kyog po'i thig gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i @30a * // nang du cha chung phyed dor nas 'di lta bu'i kyog po'i thig gnyis pa'o //
translated: Here🔽one should subtract a half-small unit. This is the second crooked line.

original: de lta bu'i thig kyog po gnyis changs thig gi g-yon du yang ngo //
analyzed: de lta bu'i thig kyog po gnyis changs thig gi g-yon du yang ngo //
translated: Two such crooked lines are on the left of the axial line.

original: de bzhin du zur thig g-yon dang cig shos dag tu yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du zur thig g-yon dang cig shos dag tu yang ngo //
translated: Similarly, on the left and right of the corner lines.

original: de nas lte bar thig skud bzung nas rtsa ba'i thig nas brtsams nas nang du sgo re re spangs par tshangs thig la thig skud bzung bas thig zlum po bzhi'o //
analyzed: de nas lte bar thig skud bzung nas rtsa ba'i thig nas brtsams nas nang du sgo re re spangs par tshangs thig la thig skud bzung bas thig zlum po bzhi'o //
translated: Then, holding the chalk line at the center, beginning from the basic line, holding the chalk line at the axial line, leaving one door space each time, one draws four circular lines.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: rtsa ba'i thig nas nyer bzung ste //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig nas nyer bzung ste //
translated: Beginning from the basic line,

original: zlum po'i thig ni rnam bzhi'o //🔽'khor lo gsum ni sgo tshad du //
analyzed: zlum po'i thig ni rnam bzhi'o // 'khor lo gsum ni sgo tshad du //
translated: there are four circular lines.🔽The three wheels are completed

original: yang dag bskor bas phyin pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag bskor bas phyin pa'o //
translated: by turning the door space.

original: lhag ma padma 'dab ma brgyad //
analyzed: lhag ma padma 'dab ma brgyad //
translated: The rest is the eight-petaled lotus.

original: tshad de 'di las lhag chad min //
analyzed: tshad de 'di las lhag chad min //
translated: The measure is not more or less than this.

original: thugs sogs 'khor lo'i mu khyud la //
analyzed: thugs sogs 'khor lo'i mu khyud la //
translated: On the circumference of the wheel of the mind and so forth

original: rdo rje padma 'khor lo'i phreng //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rdo rje padma 'khor lo'i phreng //🔽zhes gsungs so //
translated: is a garland of vajras, lotuses, and wheels.

original: da la dang po gsum re re'i nang du cha chung phyed dor bar zlum po'i thig gcig go //
analyzed: da la dang po gsum re re'i nang du cha chung phyed dor bar zlum po'i thig gcig go //
translated: In the first three of these, each of the three circles is half a minor unit in diameter.

original: bzhi pa thugs kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba'i nang mtshon par byed pa'i nang du cha chung gi bzhi cha las pha rol cha chung phyed dang gsum pa'i 'dab mdor bar lte ba'i don du ge sar gyi phreng ba'i ngo bo'i thig gcig go //
analyzed: bzhi pa thugs kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba'i nang mtshon par byed pa'i nang du cha chung gi bzhi cha las pha rol cha chung phyed dang gsum pa'i 'dab mdor bar lte ba'i don du ge sar gyi phreng ba'i ngo bo'i thig gcig go //
translated: In the fourth, the circle of mind, the inner circle is one minor unit in diameter. The outer circle is three and a half minor units in diameter. The circle in the center is for the stamens of the lotus.

original: rdo rje'i phreng ba'i don bzhi pa'i nang du cha chung phyed dor bar zlum po gcig go zhes kyang kha cig go //
analyzed: rdo rje'i phreng ba'i don bzhi pa'i nang du cha chung phyed dor bar zlum po gcig go zhes kyang kha cig go //
translated: Some say that the circle of the vajra garland is one minor unit in diameter.

original: gzhan ni rtsibs kyi glo dag tu shin gtu mi bzad pa'i rdo rje bzhis bskor ro zhes so //
analyzed: gzhan ni rtsibs kyi glo dag tu shin gtu mi bzad pa'i rdo rje bzhis bskor ro zhes so //
translated: Others say that the four corners of the spokes are surrounded by four vajras.

original: kha cig ni rtsibs kyi 'gram gyi steng du ji ltar rigs par rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo'i phreng ba'o zhes so //
analyzed: kha cig ni rtsibs kyi 'gram gyi steng du ji ltar rigs par rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo'i phreng ba'o zhes so //
translated: Others say that the spokes are surrounded by vajras, lotuses, and wheels, as appropriate.

original: 'dir phyi rol gyi thig zlum po dang nang gi thig zlum po dang / rtsibs kyi thig rnams bsrung la gzhan ni dbyi bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir phyi rol gyi thig zlum po dang nang gi thig zlum po dang / rtsibs kyi thig rnams bsrung la gzhan ni dbyi bar bya'o //
translated: Here, the outer circle, the inner circle, and the spokes are to be protected, but the others are to be eliminated.

original: khyad par du gdab pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par du gdab pa'o //
translated: The special [mantra]

original: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang 'di nyid yin no//
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang 'di nyid yin no//
translated: is also this [mantra] for the mandala of the Buddhakapāla, which has twenty-five [deities].

original: khyad par ni dang por brjod pa'i zlum po'i thig bzhi pa dang / ze'u 'bru'i thig mi bya'o //
analyzed: khyad par ni dang por brjod pa'i zlum po'i thig bzhi pa dang / ze'u 'bru'i thig mi bya'o //
translated: The difference is that the first-mentioned circle line and the stamen line are not made.

original: zlum po'i thig drug pa'i nang du ni 'dab ma cha chung lnga pa dor nas 'dir ge sar gyi rang bzhin zlum po'i thig gcig go //
analyzed: zlum po'i thig drug pa'i nang du ni 'dab ma cha chung lnga pa dor nas 'dir ge sar gyi rang bzhin zlum po'i thig gcig go //
translated: Inside the sixth circle line, having omitted the five-small-part petal, here there is one circle line that is the nature of the stamen.
