original: dpal rnal 'byor nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du cha chung phyed dang bcas pa'i gsum dor nas bar du cha chung gcig pa'i zlum po'i thig gnyis kyi dbus su chud pa'i rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
analyzed: dpal rnal 'byor nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du cha chung phyed dang bcas pa'i gsum dor nas bar du cha chung gcig pa'i zlum po'i thig gnyis kyi dbus su chud pa'i rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
translated: In the glorious Yoginīskyamvara mandala, having omitted three and a half small parts inside the root line, there is a vajra garland that is included in the middle of two circle lines that are one small part in between.

original: de nas cha chung phyed dang bzhi dor bar thig gzhan rnams ni sdus pa'i ro me bar gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas cha chung phyed dang bzhi dor bar thig gzhan rnams ni sdus pa'i ro me bar gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no //
translated: Then, having left out four and a half small units, the other lines are as in the mandala taught in the Ro ma.

original: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du gzhal yas khang gnyis pa ste /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du gzhal yas khang gnyis pa ste /
translated: Inside the basic lines, there is a second celestial mansion.

original: thig kyang 'og nas 'chad @30b bar 'gyur ba'i bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyis 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'o zhes gzhan no //
analyzed: thig kyang 'og nas 'chad @30b bar 'gyur ba'i bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyis 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'o zhes gzhan no //
translated: The lines are as in the mandala of Manjushri Vajra, with forty-three parts, as will be explained below.

original: gcig dbus kyi gzhal yas khang pas gzhal yas khang gnyis pa zlum po'o zhes so //
analyzed: gcig dbus kyi gzhal yas khang pas gzhal yas khang gnyis pa zlum po'o zhes so //
translated: One says that the second celestial mansion is a circle, with the central celestial mansion.

original: gzhan ni 'dir gzhal yas khang med do rdo rje rje'i phreng ba ni sngar bzhin no zhes so //
analyzed: gzhan ni 'dir gzhal yas khang med do rdo rje rje'i phreng ba ni sngar bzhin no zhes so //
translated: Another says that there is no celestial mansion here, and the garland of vajras is as before.

original: bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid dpal gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor la tshangs thig dang zung thig rnams kho na ste gzhan med do //
analyzed: bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid dpal gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor la tshangs thig dang zung thig rnams kho na ste gzhan med do //
translated: In the mandala of Shri Yamantaka, which has thirteen parts, there are only the Brahma lines and the yoke lines, and no others.

original: de la tshangs thig nas sgo gnyis kyi bar dor nas zur thig gi bar du ngos su sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i thig gcig go //
analyzed: de la tshangs thig nas sgo gnyis kyi bar dor nas zur thig gi bar du ngos su sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i thig gcig go //
translated: For that, from the Brahmā line to the middle of the two doors, from the corner line to the center of the center of the crossed vajra, there is one line.

original: de'i nang du cha chung gcig dor nas rdo rje'i phreng ba'i thig gcig go //
analyzed: de'i nang du cha chung gcig dor nas rdo rje'i phreng ba'i thig gcig go //
translated: Inside that, having skipped one small unit, there is one line of the vajra garland.

original: lte ba'i thig las sgo'i bar du rva lnga'o //
analyzed: lte ba'i thig las sgo'i bar du rva lnga'o //
translated: From the center line to the door, there are five horns.

original: de'i rjes la tshangs thig dang zur thig rnams dbyi bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la tshangs thig dang zur thig rnams dbyi bar bya'o //
translated: After that, the Brahmā lines and corner lines are erased.

original: 'di ni khyad du gdab pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni khyad du gdab pa'o //
translated: This is the special feature.

original: rdo rje sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor la tshangs thig dang zur thig rnams gnas pa nyis la tshangs thig gi phyi rol du lte ba'i cha chung gsum dor bar thig zlum po gcig go //
analyzed: rdo rje sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor la tshangs thig dang zur thig rnams gnas pa nyis la tshangs thig gi phyi rol du lte ba'i cha chung gsum dor bar thig zlum po gcig go //
translated: In the vajra-liberation maṇḍala, the Brahmā lines and corner lines remain. Outside the Brahmā line, having skipped three small units of the center, there is one round line.

original: de'i phyi ngos su 'dab ma cha chung drug dor bar thig zlum po gcig go //
analyzed: de'i phyi ngos su 'dab ma cha chung drug dor bar thig zlum po gcig go //
translated: Outside that, having skipped six small units of the petals, there is one round line.

original: tshangs thig dang zur thig rnams dbyi'o //
analyzed: tshangs thig dang zur thig rnams dbyi'o //
translated: The Brahmā lines and corner lines are erased.

original: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can 'od zer can gyi dkyil 'khor la 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin thig gdab bo //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can 'od zer can gyi dkyil 'khor la 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin thig gdab bo //
translated: In the maṇḍala of Marīci, which is twenty-five [in number], one should lay out the maṇḍala of Mañjuvajra.

original: bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid can bsrung ba lnga'i dkyil 'khor la tshangs thig dang zur thig rnams nyid de gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid can bsrung ba lnga'i dkyil 'khor la tshangs thig dang zur thig rnams nyid de gzhan ni med do //
translated: In the maṇḍala of the Five Protectors, which is thirteen [in number], there are only the Brahmā lines and the corner lines, and no others.

original: de la tshangs pa'i thig gi phyi rol kun tu cha bzhi dor bar dbus kyi padma'o //
analyzed: de la tshangs pa'i thig gi phyi rol kun tu cha bzhi dor bar dbus kyi padma'o //
translated: There, outside the Brahmā line, having omitted four parts, [there is] the central lotus.

original: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung gcig dor bar phyogs rnams su padma bzhi'o //
analyzed: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung gcig dor bar phyogs rnams su padma bzhi'o //
translated: Outside that, having omitted one small part, [there are] four lotuses in the directions.

original: tshangs thig dang zur thig dbyi'o zhes pa khyad par du gdab pa'o //
analyzed: tshangs thig dang zur thig dbyi'o zhes pa khyad par du gdab pa'o //
translated: The Brahmā line and the corner lines are the special laying out.

original: lnga bcu nga gsum gyi bdag nyid can rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la rtsa ba'i thig gi nang na rang gi sgo gnyis kyi tshang spangs par zur thig gnyis kyi bar du ngos su thig gcig go //
analyzed: lnga bcu nga gsum gyi bdag nyid can rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la rtsa ba'i thig gi nang na rang gi sgo gnyis kyi tshang spangs par zur thig gnyis kyi bar du ngos su thig gcig go //
translated: In the maṇḍala of the Vajra Realm, which is fifty-three [in number], inside the root lines, having omitted the space of one’s two doors, there is one line on each side between the two corner lines.

original: de nyid ni gnyis pa nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa ba'i thig yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ni gnyis pa nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa ba'i thig yin te /
translated: That is the basic line of the inner mandala.

original: sgo dang sgo khyud la sogs pa mda' yab kyi thig gi bar dang ldan zhing rta babs la sogs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: sgo dang sgo khyud la sogs pa mda' yab kyi thig gi bar dang ldan zhing rta babs la sogs pa med pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with the door, the door-jambs, and so forth up to the line of the parapet, but it does not have the pediments and so forth.

original: rtsa ba'i thig 'di'i nang du bar med pa nyid zlum po'i thig dang po'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig 'di'i nang du bar med pa nyid zlum po'i thig dang po'o //
translated: The first circle line is uninterrupted within this basic line.

original: de'i nang du rdo rje phreng ba'i cha chung gcig spangs par gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de'i nang du rdo rje phreng ba'i cha chung gcig spangs par gnyis pa'o //
translated: The second is one small unit of the vajra fence inside that.

original: de las phyogs gzhan gyi thig zlum po'i bar du tshangs thig gi g-yas kyi char thig gnyis te dang po cha chung gnyis spangs par ro //
analyzed: de las phyogs gzhan gyi thig zlum po'i bar du tshangs thig gi g-yas kyi char thig gnyis te dang po cha chung gnyis spangs par ro //
translated: From that, two lines are drawn from the right side of the brahma line to the other side up to the circle line. The first is two small units.

original: gnyis pa ni ka ba'i cha chung dor bar ro//
analyzed: gnyis pa ni ka ba'i cha chung dor bar ro//
translated: The second is one small unit of the pillar.

original: @31a * // de ltar g-yon du yang ngo //
analyzed: @31a * // de ltar g-yon du yang ngo //
translated: In the same way, on the left.

original: de nas tshangs thig dang zur thig phyi bas re'u mig dgur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas tshangs thig dang zur thig phyi bas re'u mig dgur 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, by drawing the brahma line and the corner lines, there are nine squares.

original: gzhan tshangs thig dang gtso bo'i gnas kyi snam bu'i nang gi thig rnams ni dbyi'o //
analyzed: gzhan tshangs thig dang gtso bo'i gnas kyi snam bu'i nang gi thig rnams ni dbyi'o //
translated: The other lines inside the brahma line and the platform of the main deity are omitted.

original: khyad par du gdab pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par du gdab pa'o //
translated: This is the special line-drawing.

original: de nyid bsdus pa las dbus kyi gzhal yas khang rta babs dang bcas pa'o zhes gsungs pa ni khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi dkyil 'khor kho na'i'o //
analyzed: de nyid bsdus pa las dbus kyi gzhal yas khang rta babs dang bcas pa'o zhes gsungs pa ni khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi dkyil 'khor kho na'i'o //
translated: The Compendium of Principles says that the central celestial mansion has a portico, but this refers only to the mandala of the Conqueror of the Three Realms.🔽Also, the statement:

original: gang yang / rdo rje'i ka rtse gnas rnams su //
analyzed: gang yang / rdo rje'i ka rtse gnas rnams su //
translated: In the places of the vajra corners

original: dkyil 'khor lnga yi brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor lnga yi brgyan pa'o //
translated: is the ornament of the five mandalas

original: zhes gsungs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gnas rnams su rdo rje'i ri mo zlum po bri bar bya ste /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gnas rnams su rdo rje'i ri mo zlum po bri bar bya ste /
translated: is explained by Anandagarbha as meaning that you should draw a circle of vajras in the places of the five tathagatas,

original: de rnams la yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga bris zhes kun dga' snying bos bshad pa 'di ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de rnams la yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga bris zhes kun dga' snying bos bshad pa 'di ni mi rigs te /
translated: and that you should draw five moon mandalas in those circles.

original: rdo rje'i ri mo zlum po'i rjod byed rgyud tshig 'di la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje'i ri mo zlum po'i rjod byed rgyud tshig 'di la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is incorrect because the tantra passage that describes the circle of vajras does not exist.

original: bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid can 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du sgo gnyis spangs par zur thig gnyis la reg pa'i logs thig gcig go //
analyzed: bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid can 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du sgo gnyis spangs par zur thig gnyis la reg pa'i logs thig gcig go //
translated: In the mandala of Manjushri, which has forty-three deities, there is one side line that touches the two corner lines, avoiding the two doors, inside the root lines.

original: de nyid ni gnyis pa nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa ba'i thig yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ni gnyis pa nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa ba'i thig yin te /
translated: That is the basic line of the inner mandala, the second.

original: sgo dang sgo khyud la sogs pa mda' yab kyi thig gi bar du ldan zhing rta babs la sogs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: sgo dang sgo khyud la sogs pa mda' yab kyi thig gi bar du ldan zhing rta babs la sogs pa med pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with doors, door-lintels, and so forth, up to the line of the parapets, and it does not have arched doorways and so forth.

original: 'di'i nang du rang gi sgo gnyis spangs par zur thig la reg pa'i logs thig gcig go //
analyzed: 'di'i nang du rang gi sgo gnyis spangs par zur thig la reg pa'i logs thig gcig go //
translated: Inside of it, one side line is in contact with the corner line, excluding the two of one's own door.

original: de nyid gsum pa nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa ba'i thig yin te /
analyzed: de nyid gsum pa nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa ba'i thig yin te /
translated: That is the basic line of the inner mandala, the third.

original: sgo dang sgo khyud la sogs pa dang ldan zhing rta babs la sogs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: sgo dang sgo khyud la sogs pa dang ldan zhing rta babs la sogs pa med pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with doors, door-lintels, and so forth, and it does not have arched doorways and so forth.

original: rtsa ba'i thig 'di'i nang du bar med pa nyid du zlum po'i thig dang po'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig 'di'i nang du bar med pa nyid du zlum po'i thig dang po'o //
translated: Inside of this basic line, the first circular line is without interruption.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa bshad pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi nang gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gsum pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa bshad pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi nang gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gsum pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is the third mandala, like the inner mandala of the Indestructible Expanse, as explained by the passage beginning with and so forth.

original: khyad par du gdab pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par du gdab pa'o //
translated: The special placement.

original: bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ngag gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la dkyil 'khor thams cad thun mong du phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i tshul sngar brjod pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ngag gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la dkyil 'khor thams cad thun mong du phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i tshul sngar brjod pa shes par bya ste /
translated: The Bhagavat's mandala of the lord of speech of the realm of phenomena is the common mandala of all mandalas. The method of laying out the lines of the outer mandala should be understood as previously stated.

original: phyi'i rtsa ba'i thig la sogs pa'i thig bdun ni zlum po ste 'di ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: phyi'i rtsa ba'i thig la sogs pa'i thig bdun ni zlum po ste 'di ni khyad par ro //
translated: The seven lines, such as the root line of the outer, are circles. This is the difference.🔽It is stated:

original: gang gsungs ba kun nas zlum po bzang po ste /
analyzed: gang gsungs ba kun nas zlum po bzang po ste /
translated: The excellent all-around circle.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so forth.

original: sgo khyud dang 'grel pa'i rtsa ba'i thig 'di'i nang du sgo gnyis kyi bar spangs nas zur thig gnyis po la reg pa'i ngos thig gcig go //
analyzed: sgo khyud dang 'grel pa'i rtsa ba'i thig 'di'i nang du sgo gnyis kyi bar spangs nas zur thig gnyis po la reg pa'i ngos thig gcig go //
translated: The root line of the door and lintel is one side line that touches the two corner lines, abandoning the space between the two doors inside this.

original: de nyid ni gnyis pa nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa ba'i thig yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ni gnyis pa nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa ba'i thig yin te /
translated: That itself is the second, the root line of the inner mandala.

original: sgo dang sgo khyud la sogs pa nas mda' yab @31b gyi bar dang ldan zhing rta babs med pa'o //
analyzed: sgo dang sgo khyud la sogs pa nas mda' yab @31b gyi bar dang ldan zhing rta babs med pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with doors, door jambs, and so on, up to the parapet, but lacks archways.

original: rtsa ba'i thig 'di'i nang du de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gsum pa'i rtsa ba'i thig ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig 'di'i nang du de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gsum pa'i rtsa ba'i thig ni de bzhin no //
translated: In this basic line, the basic line of such a third mandala is the same.

original: rtsa ba'i thig 'di'i nang du rang gi sgo gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa brjod pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi nang gi dkyil 'khor bzhin du dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig 'di'i nang du rang gi sgo gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa brjod pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi nang gi dkyil 'khor bzhin du dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'o //
translated: In this basic line, the fourth mandala is like the inner mandala of Vajradhātu, which is described as “one’s own two doors” and so forth.

original: khyad par du gdab pa'o//
analyzed: khyad par du gdab pa'o//
translated: This is the special insertion.

original: ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor la bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gdab pa ste /
analyzed: ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor la bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gdab pa ste /
translated: The insertion is like the mandala taught in the stage of dissolution in the Sarvadurgatipariśodhana mandala.

original: 'on kyang rdo rje phreng ba'i nang du ka ba brgyad la sogs pa med par 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser po nyid kyis brgyan pa ni khyad par zhes so //
analyzed: 'on kyang rdo rje phreng ba'i nang du ka ba brgyad la sogs pa med par 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser po nyid kyis brgyan pa ni khyad par zhes so //
translated: However, in the Vajra-Pañjarā, it is adorned with just a yellow eight-spoked wheel without the eight pillars and so forth. This is the difference.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor la rtse ba'i thig gru bzhi pa'i nang du cha chung bzhi dor bar zur thig gnyis la reg pa'i logs thig gsum mo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor la rtse ba'i thig gru bzhi pa'i nang du cha chung bzhi dor bar zur thig gnyis la reg pa'i logs thig gsum mo //
translated: In the Bhagawan Vinayaka mandala, the side lines are three, touching the two corner lines, after leaving four small units inside the square basic line.

original: de'i nang du cha chung bzhi'i bar du de bzhin du logs thig gcig go //
analyzed: de'i nang du cha chung bzhi'i bar du de bzhin du logs thig gcig go //
translated: In that, one should draw a line in the same way up to four small squares.

original: de'i nang du cha chung bzhi dor bar 'jam ba'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du brjod pa'i nang gi pho brang lta bu'i nang gi pho brang ngo //
analyzed: de'i nang du cha chung bzhi dor bar 'jam ba'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du brjod pa'i nang gi pho brang lta bu'i nang gi pho brang ngo //
translated: In that, having left out four small squares, the inner palace is like the palace described in the Maṇḍala of Vajrayoginī.

original: rim pa bzhin gdab pa'o //
analyzed: rim pa bzhin gdab pa'o //
translated: One should draw it in stages.

original: mkha' 'gro lnga'i dkyil 'khor la rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo bzhi cha'i cha phyed dang gnyis kyi bar dor nas /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro lnga'i dkyil 'khor la rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo bzhi cha'i cha phyed dang gnyis kyi bar dor nas /
translated: In the maṇḍala of the five ḍākinīs, having left out one and a half squares of the four gates of the great maṇḍala from the inside of the root line,

original: gzhan cha chung dgu'i bar la cha mnyam pa bcu gnyis byas nas logs so sor cha gnyis dor te /
analyzed: gzhan cha chung dgu'i bar la cha mnyam pa bcu gnyis byas nas logs so sor cha gnyis dor te /
translated: having made twelve equal parts in the remaining nine small squares, one should leave out two parts for each side.

original: dbus kyi cha gnyis kyi tshad kyi rtsa ba'i thig bzhi'o //
analyzed: dbus kyi cha gnyis kyi tshad kyi rtsa ba'i thig bzhi'o //
translated: The four root lines are the measure of the two central parts.

original: de re re'i brgyad cha ni sgo'o //
analyzed: de re re'i brgyad cha ni sgo'o //
translated: One eighth of each is a gate.

original: rtsa ba'i thig las phyi ngos su thig drug ces pa la sogs pa sngar bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig las phyi ngos su thig drug ces pa la sogs pa sngar bzhin du bya'o //
translated: “Six lines outside the root line” and so on is as before.

original: de ltar phyogs rnams su rta babs med pa'i gzhal yas khang bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar phyogs rnams su rta babs med pa'i gzhal yas khang bzhi pa'o //
translated: Thus, there are four celestial palaces without archways in the directions.

original: dbus su yang de bzhin du gzhal yas khang lnga pa'o //
analyzed: dbus su yang de bzhin du gzhal yas khang lnga pa'o //
translated: In the center, too, there are five celestial palaces in the same way.

original: cha chung dgu zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'dir yang rig par bya'i /
analyzed: cha chung dgu zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'dir yang rig par bya'i /
translated: One should understand nine small units, etc., here, too.

original: de lta mod kyi gzhal yas khang 'di dang bzhi po rnams kyi bar na dkyil 'khor chen po'i cha chung gcig go //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi gzhal yas khang 'di dang bzhi po rnams kyi bar na dkyil 'khor chen po'i cha chung gcig go //
translated: Nevertheless, between this celestial palace and the four, there is one small unit of the great mandala.

original: 'dir kye'i rdo rje'i gzhal yas khang la rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du cha chung gcig la gnas shing /
analyzed: 'dir kye'i rdo rje'i gzhal yas khang la rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du cha chung gcig la gnas shing /
translated: Here, the celestial palace of Hevajra is situated within one small unit inside the basic lines.

original: thig gnyis kyi nang du son pa'i rdo rje'i phreng ba gru bzhis bskor ba'i zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: thig gnyis kyi nang du son pa'i rdo rje'i phreng ba gru bzhis bskor ba'i zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: It is in the shape of a half-moon, surrounded by a vajra garland that is situated within two lines and is enclosed by four corners.

original: rtag pa'i 'khor lo'i phreng bas bskor ba'i zlum po'o //
analyzed: rtag pa'i 'khor lo'i phreng bas bskor ba'i zlum po'o //
translated: It is round, surrounded by a garland of the wheel of permanence.

original: rdo rje nyi ma'i cha dgu pa'i rin po che'i phreng bas bskor ba'i rin po che cha dgu pa'am brgyad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma'i cha dgu pa'i rin po che'i phreng bas bskor ba'i rin po che cha dgu pa'am brgyad pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like a nine-part or eight-part jewel, surrounded by a garland of jewels, which is a nine-part vajra sun.

original: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi padma'i phreng bas bskor ba'i gru bzhi pa zur bzhi sgo la phyogs ba'am padma'i rnam pa'o //🔽rta mchog gi ral gri'i phreng bas bskor @32a * //
analyzed: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi padma'i phreng bas bskor ba'i gru bzhi pa zur bzhi sgo la phyogs ba'am padma'i rnam pa'o // rta mchog gi ral gri'i phreng bas bskor @32a * //
translated: The lotus-holder's is square, with four corners, and faces the four doors, or has the form of a lotus, surrounded by a garland of lotuses.

original: ba'i grva gsum pa'o //
analyzed: ba'i grva gsum pa'o //
translated: The supreme horse's is triangular, surrounded by a garland of swords.

original: khyad par du gdab pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par du gdab pa'o //
translated: This is the special sprinkling.

original: gzhal yas khang thams cad du yang rang rang la ltos nas rtsa ba'i thig dang sgo dang cha chung gi tshad rnams rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang thams cad du yang rang rang la ltos nas rtsa ba'i thig dang sgo dang cha chung gi tshad rnams rig par bya'o //
translated: In all the celestial palaces, the basic lines, doors, and units of measurement should be understood in relation to each one.

original: 'khor los sgyur ba drug gi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba drug gi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: This is the mandala of the six world-emperors.

original: gzhal yas khang chen po'i cha chung gi tshad kyis tshangs thig nas gang cha chung bzhi pa'i bar gzhan cha chung bzhi pa'i bar dang bcas pa de cha chung bcu gnyis su byas la /
analyzed: gzhal yas khang chen po'i cha chung gi tshad kyis tshangs thig nas gang cha chung bzhi pa'i bar gzhan cha chung bzhi pa'i bar dang bcas pa de cha chung bcu gnyis su byas la /
translated: By the unit of measurement of the great celestial palace, from the Brahma line up to the fourth unit, that is divided into twelve units.

original: mdun dang rgyab dang g-yas dang g-yon gyi mtha' rnams su so sor cha gnyis kyi nang du rtsa ba'i thig cha brgyad kyi tshad du gdab po //
analyzed: mdun dang rgyab dang g-yas dang g-yon gyi mtha' rnams su so sor cha gnyis kyi nang du rtsa ba'i thig cha brgyad kyi tshad du gdab po //
translated: In the front, back, right, and left directions, two units each, the basic line is sprinkled with a measurement of eight units.

original: de dang bstun pa'i sgo'i cha chung gis sgo khyud la sogs ba'i thig dang mda' yab kyi thig gi bar du gdab po //
analyzed: de dang bstun pa'i sgo'i cha chung gis sgo khyud la sogs ba'i thig dang mda' yab kyi thig gi bar du gdab po //
translated: In accordance with that, the distance between the lines of the door frame and so forth and the lines of the parapets is marked with small units.

original: de nas phyi rol du dkyil 'khor chen po'i cha chung gi tshad kyis cha chung gnyis kyi bar dor nas tshangs thig la thig skud bzung nas tshad kyi don du thig zlum po gcig go //
analyzed: de nas phyi rol du dkyil 'khor chen po'i cha chung gi tshad kyis cha chung gnyis kyi bar dor nas tshangs thig la thig skud bzung nas tshad kyi don du thig zlum po gcig go //
translated: Then, outside, one should draw a circle with a line for the purpose of measuring, at a distance of two small units with the measure of a small unit of the great maṇḍala, holding the string at the Brahmā line.

original: 'di'i cha mnyam pa lnga byas nas cha re re'i dbus las byung ba'i tshangs thig ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i cha chung gi tshad kyi cha chung brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i cha mnyam pa lnga byas nas cha re re'i dbus las byung ba'i tshangs thig ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i cha chung gi tshad kyi cha chung brgyad pa'o //
translated: Having made five equal parts of this, the Brahmā line that arises from the center of each part is eight small units with the measure of a small unit of the great maṇḍala.

original: de'i dbus su de bzhin du tshangs thig gzhan no //
analyzed: de'i dbus su de bzhin du tshangs thig gzhan no //
translated: In the center of that, in the same way, there is another Brahmā line.

original: gnyis ba 'di re re zhing cha chung gnyis su byas la zhes pa la sogs pa nas rab tu gdab bo zhes pa'i mthar thug pa de ma thag par brjod pa dag bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis ba 'di re re zhing cha chung gnyis su byas la zhes pa la sogs pa nas rab tu gdab bo zhes pa'i mthar thug pa de ma thag par brjod pa dag bya'o //
translated: Having divided each of these two into two small units, one should perform the procedures that were just explained, from “one should draw a circle with a line for the purpose of measuring” up to “one should make a mark.”

original: dkyil 'khor drug po 'di rnams la zur thig rnams kyang gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor drug po 'di rnams la zur thig rnams kyang gdab par bya'o //
translated: One should also lay down the corner lines for these six maṇḍalas.

original: 'di rnams kyi tshangs thig nas phyi ngos su lta ba'i cha chung gsum gyi bar spangs par thig zlum po gcig go //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi tshangs thig nas phyi ngos su lta ba'i cha chung gsum gyi bar spangs par thig zlum po gcig go //
translated: Having abandoned three small units from the Brahmā line toward the outside of these, there is one circular line.

original: de'i phyi ngos su 'dab ma'i cha chung drug spangs bar thig zlum po gcig go //
analyzed: de'i phyi ngos su 'dab ma'i cha chung drug spangs bar thig zlum po gcig go //
translated: Outside of that, having abandoned six small units for the petals, there is one circular line.

original: de'i phyi ngos su phyogs dang mtshams rnams su cha chung drug pa'i padma brgyad do //
analyzed: de'i phyi ngos su phyogs dang mtshams rnams su cha chung drug pa'i padma brgyad do //
translated: Outside of that, there are eight lotuses of six small units each in the directions and the intermediate directions.

original: de nas thig zlum po gcig go / de'i phyi ngos su cha chung gcig dor bar thig zlum po'o //
analyzed: de nas thig zlum po gcig go / de'i phyi ngos su cha chung gcig dor bar thig zlum po'o //
translated: Then there is one circular line. Outside of that, having abandoned one small unit, there is a circular line.

original: de nas thams cad du tshad ba dang zur thig dbyi bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas thams cad du tshad ba dang zur thig dbyi bar bya'o //
translated: Then, all the way around, the corner lines and the boundary lines should be erased.

original: de lta bu ni 'dir gdab pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: de lta bu ni 'dir gdab pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: Such is the special layout here.

original: gzhan po brang bdun pa la sogs pa'i gzhal yas khang gi khyad par rnams kyang bshad pa'i rjes su 'brangs te dpag la mkhas pa rnams kyis thig gdab pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan po brang bdun pa la sogs pa'i gzhal yas khang gi khyad par rnams kyang bshad pa'i rjes su 'brangs te dpag la mkhas pa rnams kyis thig gdab pa'o //
translated: The differences of the celestial palaces with seven layers, and so on, should be measured by those skilled in the measurements following the explanations, and the lines should be laid out.

original: dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'dir brjod pa'i rgyud gzhan ma lus par gsungs pa'i cho ga rnams las nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs pa 'dul ba'i don du bya ba mi mthun bar gsungs so //
analyzed: dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'dir brjod pa'i rgyud gzhan ma lus par gsungs pa'i cho ga rnams las nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs pa 'dul ba'i don du bya ba mi mthun bar gsungs so //
translated: In the mandala of the Kālacakra, all the rites taught in the other tantras mentioned here are said to be incompatible with the purpose of subduing the sun-chariot and so forth.

original: de'i phyir @32b rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid mngon par 'dod pa thams cad grub par bya ba'i phyir sku sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor ma lus ba'i dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur ro zhes lhag pa'i mos pa bstan
analyzed: de'i phyir @32b rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid mngon par 'dod pa thams cad grub par bya ba'i phyir sku sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor ma lus ba'i dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur ro zhes lhag pa'i mos pa bstan
translated: Therefore, the practitioner of the completion stage, in order to accomplish all that is desired, should imagine himself as Bhagavān Great Vajradhara, the lord of all mandalas, with various bodies.

original: bas / rgyud gzhan gyi cho gas kyang rab gnas la sogs ba bya ba mi 'gal te mngon bar 'dod pa sgrub par byed do zhes pas /
analyzed: bas / rgyud gzhan gyi cho gas kyang rab gnas la sogs ba bya ba mi 'gal te mngon bar 'dod pa sgrub par byed do zhes pas /
translated: Thus, it is not contradictory to perform consecration and so forth with the rites of other tantras, as it is said to accomplish what is desired.

original: dus kyi 'khor lo'i bya ba spros pa dor nas dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa tsam brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dus kyi 'khor lo'i bya ba spros pa dor nas dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa tsam brjod par bya'o //
translated: Having abandoned the elaborate activities of the Kālacakra, I will now explain just the drawing of the mandala lines.

original: rdul tshon bri ba tsam ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rdul tshon bri ba'i skabs su brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rdul tshon bri ba tsam ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rdul tshon bri ba'i skabs su brjod par bya'o //
translated: The mere drawing of the colored powders will be described in the section on drawing the colored powders, which will come later.

original: 'dir slob dpon gyi mthe bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi khru yin la ;
analyzed: 'dir slob dpon gyi mthe bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi khru yin la ;
translated: Here, the master's thumb is one cubit.

original: khru bzhis dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: khru bzhis dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The mandala is four cubits.

original: de nyis 'gyur srid du khru brgyad pa'i tshangs thig gnyis gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyis 'gyur srid du khru brgyad pa'i tshangs thig gnyis gdab par bya'o //
translated: Twice that, eight cubits, is the distance for the two threads of Brahma.

original: de nas de bzhin du zur thig gnyis so //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du zur thig gnyis so //
translated: Then, likewise, there are two corner threads.

original: thig skud ni sbom du slob dpon gyi nas kyi tshad do //
analyzed: thig skud ni sbom du slob dpon gyi nas kyi tshad do //
translated: The thread is thick, the size of the master's barley grain.

original: de la thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i drug cha ni mthe bong phyed kyi chad de cha chung du tha snyad gdags par bya'o //
analyzed: de la thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i drug cha ni mthe bong phyed kyi chad de cha chung du tha snyad gdags par bya'o //
translated: There, one-sixth of the door of the mind mandala is half a thumb, which is to be designated as a small unit.

original: de la tshangs thig gi lte bar gtso bo'i padma'i lte ba'i don du tshangs thig las phyi ngos su cha chung gnyis dor nas tshangs thig gzhan gyi steng du bzung ste thig zlum po gcig gdab po //
analyzed: de la tshangs thig gi lte bar gtso bo'i padma'i lte ba'i don du tshangs thig las phyi ngos su cha chung gnyis dor nas tshangs thig gzhan gyi steng du bzung ste thig zlum po gcig gdab po //
translated: There, at the center of the Brahma thread, two small units are to be left outside of the Brahma thread for the purpose of the center of the principal lotus. Holding it on top of the other Brahma thread, one thread circle is cast.

original: de nas 'dab ma'i cha chung bzhi dor nas thig gcig gdab bo //
analyzed: de nas 'dab ma'i cha chung bzhi dor nas thig gcig gdab bo //
translated: Then, having omitted four small parts of the petal, one should lay down a line.

original: de nas rdo rje'i phreng ba'i cha chung spangs par thig gcig go //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje'i phreng ba'i cha chung spangs par thig gcig go //
translated: Then, having omitted one small part of the vajra garland, one line.

original: de nas lha'i padma'i cha chung bzhi dor bar thig gcig go //
analyzed: de nas lha'i padma'i cha chung bzhi dor bar thig gcig go //
translated: Then, having omitted four small parts of the divine lotus, one line.

original: de nas rdo rje'i phreng ba'i cha chung gcig dor bar thig gcig go //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje'i phreng ba'i cha chung gcig dor bar thig gcig go //
translated: Then, having omitted one small part of the vajra garland, one line.

original: thig bzhi po 'di rnams ni zur thig gnyis kyi bar du'o //
analyzed: thig bzhi po 'di rnams ni zur thig gnyis kyi bar du'o //
translated: These four lines are between the two corner lines.

original: 'dir lha'i cha chung bzhi'i dbus su ni padma'i cha chung bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir lha'i cha chung bzhi'i dbus su ni padma'i cha chung bzhi pa'o //
translated: Here, in the middle of four small parts of the divine [space], there are four small parts of the lotus.

original: de'i 'gram gnyis su ka ba gnyis te rgyar cha chung re re srid du cha chung bzhi'o //
analyzed: de'i 'gram gnyis su ka ba gnyis te rgyar cha chung re re srid du cha chung bzhi'o //
translated: On both sides of that are two pillars, one small part wide and four small parts long.

original: de gnyis kyi 'gram du rgyar cha chung gsum pa'i bum pa gnyis te de ltar ring ba'o //
analyzed: de gnyis kyi 'gram du rgyar cha chung gsum pa'i bum pa gnyis te de ltar ring ba'o //
translated: On both sides of those are two vases, three small parts wide and long like that.

original: de dag gi 'gram du de bzhin du ka ba gnyis so //
analyzed: de dag gi 'gram du de bzhin du ka ba gnyis so //
translated: On both sides of those are two pillars like that.

original: de nas zur thig gi mthar thug pa'i thig mtha' ma las phyi ngos su cha chung bdun gyi bar spangs nas thig gcig go //
analyzed: de nas zur thig gi mthar thug pa'i thig mtha' ma las phyi ngos su cha chung bdun gyi bar spangs nas thig gcig go //
translated: Then, having skipped seven small squares outside from the last line to the corner line, there is one line.

original: de nas lha snam gyi cha chung bzhi pa'i bar spangs nas thig gcig go //
analyzed: de nas lha snam gyi cha chung bzhi pa'i bar spangs nas thig gcig go //
translated: Then, having skipped four small squares to the deity platforms, there is one line.

original: de nas cha chung gcig dor nas rtsa ba'i thig ste zur thig gi bar du'o //
analyzed: de nas cha chung gcig dor nas rtsa ba'i thig ste zur thig gi bar du'o //
translated: Then, having skipped one small square, there is the root line up to the corner line.

original: 'dir thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni rtsa ba'i thig gi mthar thug pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'dir thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni rtsa ba'i thig gi mthar thug pa kho na'o //
translated: Here, the mind maṇḍala is only up to the root line.

original: de ltar gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang de bzhin du sku'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de ltar gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang de bzhin du sku'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: In that way, there is the speech maṇḍala and likewise the body maṇḍala.

original: tshangs thig gi g-yas @33a * //
analyzed: tshangs thig gi g-yas @33a * //
translated: To the right and left of the Brahmā lines,

original: g-yon du rtsa ba'i thig cha chung gsum gsum sngon bzhin phyi bas sgo ni cha chung drug pa ste 'khor lo'i brgyad char 'gyur ro //
analyzed: g-yon du rtsa ba'i thig cha chung gsum gsum sngon bzhin phyi bas sgo ni cha chung drug pa ste 'khor lo'i brgyad char 'gyur ro //
translated: there are three small squares, as before, outside the root line. The door is six small squares, which is one-eighth of the maṇḍala.

original: sgo khyud dang 'gram dang logs gsum gyi tshad ni sgo dang mnyam mo //
analyzed: sgo khyud dang 'gram dang logs gsum gyi tshad ni sgo dang mnyam mo //
translated: The measurements of the door frame, the sides, and the walls are equal to the door.

original: rtsa ba'i thig las phyi rol du cha chung phyed dang gnyis dor bar rtsig pa'i thig ste //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig las phyi rol du cha chung phyed dang gnyis dor bar rtsig pa'i thig ste //
translated: The line of the wall is two and a half small units outside the basic line.

original: zur thig las 'thon nas sgo khyud dang 'gram dang logs kyi rjes su 'gro bas gsum kyog po mda' yab kyi thig gi mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: zur thig las 'thon nas sgo khyud dang 'gram dang logs kyi rjes su 'gro bas gsum kyog po mda' yab kyi thig gi mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The three curved lines emerge from the corner lines, follow the architrave, and end at the line of the parapets.

original: de'i glor rta babs kyi ka ba'i cha chung phyed dang gnyis dor bar mda' yab kyi thig la rtse mo reg pa'i thig ste /
analyzed: de'i glor rta babs kyi ka ba'i cha chung phyed dang gnyis dor bar mda' yab kyi thig la rtse mo reg pa'i thig ste /
translated: Half and two small units outside of that, the line touching the tip of the parapet line is the line of the pediment.

original: nang gi dpangs su cha chud phyed dang brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi dpangs su cha chud phyed dang brgyad pa'o //
translated: It is eight and a half small units high.

original: rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi'i thig las phyi ngos su stegs bu'i cha chung gsum gyi bar dor nas thig go //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi'i thig las phyi ngos su stegs bu'i cha chung gsum gyi bar dor nas thig go //
translated: Outside the basic line, the line is in the space between the three small units of the platform.

original: de nas rin po che'i pha gu'i cha chung phyed dang gnyis dor bar thig go //
analyzed: de nas rin po che'i pha gu'i cha chung phyed dang gnyis dor bar thig go //
translated: Then, half and two small units outside of that is the line of the precious wall.

original: de nas dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i snam bu'i cha chung gsum dor bar thig go //
analyzed: de nas dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i snam bu'i cha chung gsum dor bar thig go //
translated: Then, three small units outside of that is the line of the lattice and half-lattice bands.

original: de nas rin chen shar bu'i cha chung phyed dang gnyis dor bar thig go //
analyzed: de nas rin chen shar bu'i cha chung phyed dang gnyis dor bar thig go //
translated: Then, having skipped two and a half small squares, draw the line of the jewel finial.

original: de nas mda' yab kyi snam bu'i cha chung phyed dang gnyis dor bar mda' yab kyi thig ste zur thig nas zur thig gzhan gyi bar du ring ba'o //
analyzed: de nas mda' yab kyi snam bu'i cha chung phyed dang gnyis dor bar mda' yab kyi thig ste zur thig nas zur thig gzhan gyi bar du ring ba'o //
translated: Then, having skipped one and a half small squares of the ledge, draw the line of the ledge. It is long, from corner to corner.

original: stegs bu'i thig la sogs pa bzhi ni thig gzhan gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: stegs bu'i thig la sogs pa bzhi ni thig gzhan gyi bar du'o //
translated: The four lines of the base and so forth are in between the other lines.

original: 'dir ni ka ba gcig gi steng nas ka ba gnyis pa'i steng du son pa'i thig ni gdung mtshon bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni ka ba gcig gi steng nas ka ba gnyis pa'i steng du son pa'i thig ni gdung mtshon bar byed pa ste /
translated: Here, the line that goes from the top of one pillar to the top of the next pillar indicates the beam.

original: 'di'i nang du mda' yab rnams bri bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i nang du mda' yab rnams bri bar mi bya'o //
translated: The ledges should not be drawn inside this.

original: ka ba'i steng du rta babs ni sgo'i tshad las steng du sum 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ka ba'i steng du rta babs ni sgo'i tshad las steng du sum 'gyur ro //
translated: The pediment above the pillar is three times the size of the door.

original: de yang rim pa gsum pa ste /
analyzed: de yang rim pa gsum pa ste /
translated: Moreover, it has three levels.

original: dang po ni cha chung drug go //
analyzed: dang po ni cha chung drug go //
translated: The first is six small squares.

original: gnyis pa ni cha chung phyed dang lnga'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni cha chung phyed dang lnga'o //
translated: The second is four and a half small squares.

original: gsum pa ni cha chung phyed dang bzhi'o //
analyzed: gsum pa ni cha chung phyed dang bzhi'o //
translated: The third is four and a half small squares.

original: har mi ni cha chung gnyis so //
analyzed: har mi ni cha chung gnyis so //
translated: The harmika is two small squares.

original: de'i steng du bum pa cha chung gnyis pa'o ;
analyzed: de'i steng du bum pa cha chung gnyis pa'o ;
translated: On top of that, the vase is two small units.

original: / de la rim pa dang po la ka ba'i steng du cha chung gcig pa'i snam bu cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhir ring ba'o //
analyzed: / de la rim pa dang po la ka ba'i steng du cha chung gcig pa'i snam bu cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhir ring ba'o //
translated: On the first level, the platform above the pillars is twenty-four small units long, one small unit wide.

original: de'i steng du cha chung gcig pa'i myos pas bsrung ba'i snam bu cha chung bcu drug tu ring ba'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du cha chung gcig pa'i myos pas bsrung ba'i snam bu cha chung bcu drug tu ring ba'o //
translated: On top of that, the protective platform is sixteen small units long, one small unit wide.

original: de'i steng du dbus su cha chung bzhi pa gru bzhi pa ste mchod pa'i lha mo'i gnas so //
analyzed: de'i steng du dbus su cha chung bzhi pa gru bzhi pa ste mchod pa'i lha mo'i gnas so //
translated: On top of that, in the center is a square with four small units, the place of the offering goddesses.

original: de'i g-yas dang g-yon du cha chung gcig pa'i ka ba'o //
analyzed: de'i g-yas dang g-yon du cha chung gcig pa'i ka ba'o //
translated: To the right and left of that are pillars one small unit wide.

original: de dag gi glor de bzhin du mchod pa'i lha mo'i gnas so //
analyzed: de dag gi glor de bzhin du mchod pa'i lha mo'i gnas so //
translated: In the corners are the places of the offering goddesses.

original: de'i glor slar yang ka ba cha chung gcig pa'o //
analyzed: de'i glor slar yang ka ba cha chung gcig pa'o //
translated: In the corners again are pillars one small unit wide.

original: de dag gi gzhogs su rta babs kyi ka ba'i steng du mche ba can gyi dbang po dag mnan pa'i mgo bo'i steng du bteg pa'i seng ge dag go //
analyzed: de dag gi gzhogs su rta babs kyi ka ba'i steng du mche ba can gyi dbang po dag mnan pa'i mgo bo'i steng du bteg pa'i seng ge dag go //
translated: At the sides of those, on top of the pillars of the archway, are lions supporting the heads of the supine lords of the beasts.

original: de dag gi mgo dang @33b ka ba bzhi'i steng du cha chung phyed pa'i snam bu cha chung bco brgyad du ring ba'o //
analyzed: de dag gi mgo dang @33b ka ba bzhi'i steng du cha chung phyed pa'i snam bu cha chung bco brgyad du ring ba'o //
translated: On top of those and the four pillars, there is a half-module-wide ledge, eighteen modules long.

original: de'i steng du cha chung gcig pa'i myos pas bsrung ba'i cha chung bcu gnyis su ring ba'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du cha chung gcig pa'i myos pas bsrung ba'i cha chung bcu gnyis su ring ba'o //
translated: On top of that, there is a one-module-wide rain ledge, twelve modules long.

original: de'i steng du cha chung gsum pa'i snam bu cha chung bcu gnyis su ring ba'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du cha chung gsum pa'i snam bu cha chung bcu gnyis su ring ba'o //
translated: On top of that, there is a three-module-wide ledge, twelve modules long.

original: de la so sor bzhi chas nyung ba'i cha chung gcig pa'i ka ba bzhi'o //
analyzed: de la so sor bzhi chas nyung ba'i cha chung gcig pa'i ka ba bzhi'o //
translated: On that, there are four pillars, each one module wide and three-quarters of a module apart.

original: ka ba'i bar rnams su so sor cha chung gsum pa'i lha'i gnas gsum mo //
analyzed: ka ba'i bar rnams su so sor cha chung gsum pa'i lha'i gnas gsum mo //
translated: Between the pillars, there are three divine residences, each three modules wide.

original: phyi'i ka ba'i glo dag tu gdung 'degs pa'i lha mo gnyis so //
analyzed: phyi'i ka ba'i glo dag tu gdung 'degs pa'i lha mo gnyis so //
translated: On the sides of the outer pillars, there are two goddesses supporting beams.

original: de dag gi mgo gnyis dang ka ba rnams kyi steng du cha chung phyed pa'i snam bu cha chung bco lngar ring ba'o //
analyzed: de dag gi mgo gnyis dang ka ba rnams kyi steng du cha chung phyed pa'i snam bu cha chung bco lngar ring ba'o //
translated: On top of their two heads and the pillars, there is a half-module-wide ledge, fifteen modules long.

original: de'i steng du cha chung gcig pa'i myos pas bsrung ba'i snam bu cha chung brgyad du ring ba'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du cha chung gcig pa'i myos pas bsrung ba'i snam bu cha chung brgyad du ring ba'o //
translated: On top of that, there is a one-module-wide rain ledge, eight modules long.

original: de'i steng du cha chung gnyis pa'i snam bu cha chung brgyad du ring ba'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du cha chung gnyis pa'i snam bu cha chung brgyad du ring ba'o //
translated: On top of that, the ledge is two small parts wide and eight small parts long.

original: de nas so sor cha chung phyed pa'i ka ba bzhi'o //
analyzed: de nas so sor cha chung phyed pa'i ka ba bzhi'o //
translated: Then there are four pillars, each half a small part.

original: ka ba'i bar rnams su lha'i gnas gsum ste re re zhing cha chung gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: ka ba'i bar rnams su lha'i gnas gsum ste re re zhing cha chung gnyis pa'o //
translated: Between the pillars are three divine abodes, each two small parts.

original: phyi'i ka ba'i glo dag tu gdung 'degs pa'i lha mo gnyis so //
analyzed: phyi'i ka ba'i glo dag tu gdung 'degs pa'i lha mo gnyis so //
translated: On the sides of the outer pillars are two goddesses supporting beams.

original: de'i steng du cha chung phyed pa'i snam bu cha chung bcu gnyis su ring ba'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du cha chung phyed pa'i snam bu cha chung bcu gnyis su ring ba'o //
translated: On top of that is a ledge half a small part high and twelve small parts long.

original: de'i steng du har mi ste srid du cha chung brgyad po'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du har mi ste srid du cha chung brgyad po'o //
translated: On top of that is a harmika, eight small parts wide.

original: de'i steng du bum pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du bum pa'o //
translated: On top of that is a vase.

original: de'i g-yas dang g-yon du rgyal mtshan gyi yu ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: de'i g-yas dang g-yon du rgyal mtshan gyi yu ba'i gnas so //
translated: To the right and left of that are the bases of the flagpole.

original: de ltar snam bu thams cad kyi rtse mo la dril bu dang mda' yab dang me long dang rgyal mtshan dang bad na rnams so //
analyzed: de ltar snam bu thams cad kyi rtse mo la dril bu dang mda' yab dang me long dang rgyal mtshan dang bad na rnams so //
translated: Thus, at the top of all the ledges are bells, parapets, mirrors, victory banners, and tassels.

original: 'dir thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rtsa ba'i thig nas phyi ngos su gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'dir thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rtsa ba'i thig nas phyi ngos su gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Here, the speech maṇḍala is on the outer side from the root line of the mind maṇḍala.

original: de'i phyogs re rer cha chung bcu gnyis ba'i gnas ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa la sogs pa nas mda' yab kyi mthar thug pa'i snam bu rnams kyis khyab pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyogs re rer cha chung bcu gnyis ba'i gnas ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa la sogs pa nas mda' yab kyi mthar thug pa'i snam bu rnams kyis khyab pa'o //
translated: In each of its directions, the space of twelve small units is occupied by the wall of the mind mandala, and so forth, up to the ledges at the end of the parapets.

original: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung bdun pa'i bar spangs nas thig gcig go //
analyzed: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung bdun pa'i bar spangs nas thig gcig go //
translated: Outside of that, after leaving a space of seven small units, there is one line.

original: de nas cha chung bzhi pa'i lha snam dor nas thig gcig go //
analyzed: de nas cha chung bzhi pa'i lha snam dor nas thig gcig go //
translated: Then, after leaving a space of four small units for the deity platforms, there is one line.

original: snam bu 'di la cha chung bzhi pa'i padma rnams te /
analyzed: snam bu 'di la cha chung bzhi pa'i padma rnams te /
translated: On this ledge are the four small unit lotuses.

original: 'on kyang phyogs su son pa thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rta babs kyi 'og tu gnas pa ni rim pa gnyis pa'i myos pas bsrung ba la sogs pa'i cha chung bzhi pa'i gnas su ka ba gnyis kyi cha chung phyed pa bsnur nas bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang phyogs su son pa thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rta babs kyi 'og tu gnas pa ni rim pa gnyis pa'i myos pas bsrung ba la sogs pa'i cha chung bzhi pa'i gnas su ka ba gnyis kyi cha chung phyed pa bsnur nas bri bar bya'o //
translated: However, those that reach the directions, located below the archways of the mind mandala, should be drawn in the space of four small units for the protection circle, etc. of the second level, after pushing out half a small unit of the two pillars.

original: de nas lha snam gyi thig las phyi ngos su cha chung gcig dor bar rtsa ba'i thig go //
analyzed: de nas lha snam gyi thig las phyi ngos su cha chung gcig dor bar rtsa ba'i thig go //
translated: Then, after leaving one small unit outside of the deity platform line, there is the root line.

original: thig gsum po 'di zur thig gi mthar thug bar ring ba'o //🔽rtsa ba'i thig la tshangs thig gi g-yas dang g-yon du cha chung drug @34a * //
analyzed: thig gsum po 'di zur thig gi mthar thug bar ring ba'o // rtsa ba'i thig la tshangs thig gi g-yas dang g-yon du cha chung drug @34a * //
translated: These three lines are long up to the end of the corner line.🔽On the basic line, six fingerbreadths to the right and left of the Brahmā line, as before,

original: drug sngon bzhin phyi bas sgo cha chung bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: drug sngon bzhin phyi bas sgo cha chung bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: the door is sixteen fingerbreadths.

original: de nas sgo khyud la sogs pa nas rta babs kyi mthar thug pa rnams thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo khyud la sogs pa las nyis 'gyur du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas sgo khyud la sogs pa nas rta babs kyi mthar thug pa rnams thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo khyud la sogs pa las nyis 'gyur du 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, from the door lintel and so on up to the archways, they are twice the size of the door lintel and so on of the mind maṇḍala.

original: gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di'i rtsa ba'i thig las phyi ngos su sku'i dkyil 'khor ro ;
analyzed: gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di'i rtsa ba'i thig las phyi ngos su sku'i dkyil 'khor ro ;
translated: Outside the basic line of this speech maṇḍala is the body maṇḍala.

original: / de'i phyogs re re cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa la sogs pa mda' yab kyi mthar thug pa'i snam bu rnams kyis khyab pa'o //
analyzed: / de'i phyogs re re cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa la sogs pa mda' yab kyi mthar thug pa'i snam bu rnams kyis khyab pa'o //
translated: In each direction, the space of twenty-four fingerbreadths is covered by the wall and so on of the speech maṇḍala, up to the parapet.

original: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung bcu gcig dor nas thig go //
analyzed: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung bcu gcig dor nas thig go //
translated: Outside of that, having skipped eleven fingerbreadths, there is a line.

original: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung bcu gnyis kyi lha snam dor nas thig go //
analyzed: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung bcu gnyis kyi lha snam dor nas thig go //
translated: Outside of that, having omitted twelve small parts for the base of the deity platform, draw the lines.

original: lha snam 'di la padma bcu gnyis te re re zhing cha chung bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: lha snam 'di la padma bcu gnyis te re re zhing cha chung bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: This deity platform has twelve lotuses, each of which is twelve small parts.

original: de la cha chung bcu gnyis pa'i padma cha bdun byas nas dbus kyi cha ni lte ba'o //
analyzed: de la cha chung bcu gnyis pa'i padma cha bdun byas nas dbus kyi cha ni lte ba'o //
translated: There, having divided a lotus of twelve small parts into seven parts, the central part is the center.

original: g-yas dang g-yon gyi cha dag ni 'dab ma bzhi'o //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon gyi cha dag ni 'dab ma bzhi'o //
translated: The right and left parts are the four petals.

original: de'i g-yas dang g-yon du brgyad do //
analyzed: de'i g-yas dang g-yon du brgyad do //
translated: To the right and left of that are eight.

original: de'i g-yas dang g-yon dag bcu drug go //
analyzed: de'i g-yas dang g-yon dag bcu drug go //
translated: To the right and left of that are sixteen.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor gsum rnams kyi 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor gsum rnams kyi 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
translated: Thus, there are twenty-eight petals in the three maṇḍalas.

original: lha snam gyi thig las rtsi ngos su cha chung gcig dor bar rtsa ba'i thig go //
analyzed: lha snam gyi thig las rtsi ngos su cha chung gcig dor bar rtsa ba'i thig go //
translated: One should omit one small part from the line of the deity platform toward the side and draw the base line.

original: thig gsum po 'di srid du zur thig gi bar du'o //
analyzed: thig gsum po 'di srid du zur thig gi bar du'o //
translated: These three lines extend to the corner lines.

original: rtsa ba'i thig gi tshangs thig gi g-yas dang g-yon dag tu cha chung bcu gnyis sngon bzhin phyi ba las sgo cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin no //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i thig gi tshangs thig gi g-yas dang g-yon dag tu cha chung bcu gnyis sngon bzhin phyi ba las sgo cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin no //
translated: To the right and left of the brahma line of the base line, having omitted twelve small parts as before, the door is twenty-four small parts.

original: de nas de'i sgo khyud la sogs pa nas rta babs kyi mthar thug ba rnams gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo khyud la sogs pa nyis 'gyur te chu'i khor yug gi phyed tshun chad do //
analyzed: de nas de'i sgo khyud la sogs pa nas rta babs kyi mthar thug ba rnams gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo khyud la sogs pa nyis 'gyur te chu'i khor yug gi phyed tshun chad do //
translated: Then, from the architraves and so on up to the pediments, the architraves and so on of the Speech Mandala are twice as large as those of the Body Mandala, extending up to half of the water perimeter.

original: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rta babs rnams kyi phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i dbus rnams su cha chung bcu gnyis pa'i shing rta rnams so //
analyzed: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rta babs rnams kyi phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i dbus rnams su cha chung bcu gnyis pa'i shing rta rnams so //
translated: Outside the pediments of the Speech Mandala, in the middle of the gates of the Body Mandala, there are chariots twelve small units in size.

original: de nas sa'i khor yug cha chung bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de nas sa'i khor yug cha chung bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: Then, the earth perimeter is twelve small units.

original: de'i phyi ngos su chu'i khor yug cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: de'i phyi ngos su chu'i khor yug cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: Outside that, the water perimeter is twenty-four small units.

original: de nas me'i 'khor yug cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: de nas me'i 'khor yug cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: Then, the fire perimeter is twenty-four small units.

original: de nas rlung gi khor yug cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: de nas rlung gi khor yug cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: Then, the wind perimeter is twenty-four small units.

original: rlung gi khor yug las phyi ngos su nam mkha'i khor yug cha chung bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: rlung gi khor yug las phyi ngos su nam mkha'i khor yug cha chung bcu gnyis so //
translated: Outside the wind perimeter, the space perimeter is twelve small units.

original: khor yug de'i phyi ngos su 'od zer gyi phreng ba cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: khor yug de'i phyi ngos su 'od zer gyi phreng ba cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: On the outer side of that environment, there is a garland of light rays, twenty-four small units.

original: sa'i khor yug la sogs pa drug po 'di rnams rang rang gi dang por thig zlum po'o //
analyzed: sa'i khor yug la sogs pa drug po 'di rnams rang rang gi dang por thig zlum po'o //
translated: The six, the environment of earth, and so on, are circles at their own first [unit].

original: 'od kyi khor yug gi mthar yang ste thig zlum po bdun no //
analyzed: 'od kyi khor yug gi mthar yang ste thig zlum po bdun no //
translated: At the end of the environment of light, there is also a circle. There are seven circles.

original: de lta bu 'di ni gtso bo thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gsum @34b gyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de lta bu 'di ni gtso bo thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gsum @34b gyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: This is the mandala of the principal mind vajra, the mandala that is the nature of the three mandalas.

original: 'di'i thig skud la ni khru brgyad de sa'i khor yug gi thog ma'i bar du'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: 'di'i thig skud la ni khru brgyad de sa'i khor yug gi thog ma'i bar du'o zhes pa ni /
translated: The thread line of this [mandala] is eight cubits, up to the environment of earth.

original: phyogs dang bo'o //
analyzed: phyogs dang bo'o //
translated: This is the first direction.

original: gang gi tshe thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad dang / gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad bsdoms nas sgo cha chung bco brgyad yongs su brtags te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad dang / gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad bsdoms nas sgo cha chung bco brgyad yongs su brtags te /
translated: When the width of the door of the mind mandala and the width of the door of the speech mandala are added together, the door is eighteen small units.

original: de'i drug cha la cha chung gi tha snyad byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de'i drug cha la cha chung gi tha snyad byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: When one-sixth of that is designated as a small unit,

original: cha chung des gtso bo'i padma'i lte ba la sogs pa nas 'od kyi phreng ba'i mthar thug par cha chung gi grangs bya'o //
analyzed: cha chung des gtso bo'i padma'i lte ba la sogs pa nas 'od kyi phreng ba'i mthar thug par cha chung gi grangs bya'o //
translated: With that small unit, from the center of the lotus of the principal deity up to the end of the garland of light, one should count the number of small units.

original: de'i tshe gtso bo thugs rdo rje dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor khru bcu gnyis dang / de'i nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud ni sa'i khor yug gi thog ma'i bar du khru nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe gtso bo thugs rdo rje dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor khru bcu gnyis dang / de'i nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud ni sa'i khor yug gi thog ma'i bar du khru nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: At that time, the principal deity, the essence of the three mandalas, is twelve cubits, and the thread line of its double size is twenty-four cubits up to the edge of the ground mandala.

original: phyogs gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa'o //
translated: This is the second direction.

original: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje gsung rdo rje'i gnas su gyur nas gsung rdo rje ni gtso bo ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje gsung rdo rje'i gnas su gyur nas gsung rdo rje ni gtso bo ste /
translated: When the Bhagavān Vajra Mind becomes the abode of Vajra Speech, Vajra Speech is the principal deity.

original: de las gzhan pa'i lha la sogs pa'i bkod pa ni phyogs dang po bzhin du ste /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i lha la sogs pa'i bkod pa ni phyogs dang po bzhin du ste /
translated: The arrangement of the other deities, etc., is the same as in the first direction.

original: gang gi tshe yang /
analyzed: gang gi tshe yang /
translated: Also, when

original: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa dang / de'i nyis 'gyur gnyis pa dang / de nyis 'gyur gsum pa yin pa de'i tshe khru bcu drug gi dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang / de nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud ni khru sum cu so gnyis pa ste /
analyzed: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa dang / de'i nyis 'gyur gnyis pa dang / de nyis 'gyur gsum pa yin pa de'i tshe khru bcu drug gi dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang / de nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud ni khru sum cu so gnyis pa ste /
translated: The thread of the second is thirty-two cubits.

original: sa'i khor yug gi dang po'i bar du'o zhes pa phyogs gsum pa'o//
analyzed: sa'i khor yug gi dang po'i bar du'o zhes pa phyogs gsum pa'o//
translated: This is the third position.

original: gang gi tshe dang por brjod pa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad dang / dang por brjod pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad bsdoms nas sgo cha chung sum cur yongs su brtags te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dang por brjod pa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad dang / dang por brjod pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad bsdoms nas sgo cha chung sum cur yongs su brtags te /
translated: When the measure of the door of the first-mentioned mind mandala and the measure of the door of the first-mentioned body mandala are added together and the door is fully examined with thirty small units,

original: de'i drug cha la cha chung du 'dogs pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de'i drug cha la cha chung du 'dogs pa de'i tshe /
translated: then six of those small units are designated as one small unit.

original: cha chung des gtso bo'i lte ba la sogs pa nas 'od kyi khor yug gi mthar thug par cha chung gi grangs bya zhing /
analyzed: cha chung des gtso bo'i lte ba la sogs pa nas 'od kyi khor yug gi mthar thug par cha chung gi grangs bya zhing /
translated: At that time, the number of small units from the center of the principal figure up to the end of the halo should be calculated with those small units.

original: bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje yang sku rdo rje'i gnas su bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje yang sku rdo rje'i gnas su bya'o //
translated: The Bhagavat Cittavajra should be placed in the location of the Body Vajra.

original: sku rdo rje ni gtso bo ste /
analyzed: sku rdo rje ni gtso bo ste /
translated: The Body Vajra is the principal one.

original: de las gzhan pa'i lha la sogs pa dgod pa ni phyogs dang po bzhin te /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i lha la sogs pa dgod pa ni phyogs dang po bzhin te /
translated: The arrangement of the other deities, etc., is the same as in the first part.

original: de'i tshe gtso bo sku rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid khru nyi shu dang / de nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud kyang sa'i khor yug gi thog ma'i bar du khru bzhi bcu pa'o zhes pa ni phyogs bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe gtso bo sku rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid khru nyi shu dang / de nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud kyang sa'i khor yug gi thog ma'i bar du khru bzhi bcu pa'o zhes pa ni phyogs bzhi pa'o //
translated: At that time, the principal one, the Body Vajra, is twenty cubits in size, and the thread for the double-sized mandala is forty cubits, extending to the edge of the ground. This is the fourth part.

original: de ltar yang dri ma med pa'i 'od las thig skud khru brgyad pa zhes pa'i rtsa ba la khru brgyad pa zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur ro zhes bkral nas /
analyzed: de ltar yang dri ma med pa'i 'od las thig skud khru brgyad pa zhes pa'i rtsa ba la khru brgyad pa zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur ro zhes bkral nas /
translated: Thus, in Vimalaprabha, the root text states the thread is eight cubits, and it is explained that eight cubits means double the mandala.

original: de la dang po'i sangs rgyas las /🔽thugs kyi dkyil 'khor khru bcu @35a * //
analyzed: de la dang po'i sangs rgyas las / thugs kyi dkyil 'khor khru bcu @35a * //
translated: In the Adibuddha, it states:

original: gnyis su bya zhing thig skud ni khru nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: gnyis su bya zhing thig skud ni khru nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: The mind mandala should be made twelve cubits, and the thread twenty-four cubits.

original: de bzhin du gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni khru bcu drug pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni khru bcu drug pa'o //
translated: Similarly, the speech mandala is sixteen cubits,

original: sku'i dkyil 'khor ni khru nyi shu'o zhes pa ni thig skud nyis 'gyur gyi nges pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sku'i dkyil 'khor ni khru nyi shu'o zhes pa ni thig skud nyis 'gyur gyi nges pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
translated: This is the rule of double the string.

original: yang dbang gi don du dbus kyi dkyil 'khor tsam bri bar rjes su gnang ste /
analyzed: yang dbang gi don du dbus kyi dkyil 'khor tsam bri bar rjes su gnang ste /
translated: Also, it is permitted to draw just the central mandala for the purpose of initiation.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: dbang gi don du dkyil 'khor ram ni rigs kyi dbang las phyi yi 'khor los rab tu dman par 'gyur /
analyzed: dbang gi don du dkyil 'khor ram ni rigs kyi dbang las phyi yi 'khor los rab tu dman par 'gyur /
translated: For the purpose of initiation, the mandala or the outer wheel is inferior due to the power of the family.

analyzed: 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po yis // kun nas dpag tshad mtha' ru ni //
translated: The king who is connected with the wheel🔽should draw the outer maṇḍala

original: phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //🔽mkhas pas gdul bya'i skye bo yi //
analyzed: phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar bya // mkhas pas gdul bya'i skye bo yi //

analyzed: sems rnams yang dag bltas nas ni //
translated: the minds of the beings to be tamed,

original: 'dod pas tshad ni byas na yang //
analyzed: 'dod pas tshad ni byas na yang //
translated: should make the size according to his desire;

original: nyes pa cung zad yod ma yin //🔽rang gi 'dod pas dkyil 'khor kun //
analyzed: nyes pa cung zad yod ma yin // rang gi 'dod pas dkyil 'khor kun //
translated: there is not the slightest fault.🔽Having drawn the entire maṇḍala

analyzed: lag ba'i mthil du bri byas na //

analyzed: sa steng sogs su smos ci dgos //

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor dpag tu med pa'i dbye ba tha dad ba rnams ji tsam zhig brjod cing bya bar nus //

original: gang gi phyir na bcom ldan 'das kyis //🔽dkyil 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin //
analyzed: gang gi phyir na bcom ldan 'das kyis // dkyil 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin //
translated: As the Bhagavān said:🔽Who can demonstrate

analyzed: rab tu bstan par su yis nus ;
translated: the maṇḍala just as it is?

original: / rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: / rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the yoga of one's deity,

analyzed: dkyil 'khor brtag par grub pa yin //

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: bhr'um aam hr'i: kham h'um rnams las skyes pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bor bsgoms nas / nam mkha' la bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kar / bhr'um la sogs pa las grub pa'i ye shes kyi tshon rnams thig skud 'du bya bar brjod pa'i 'bar ba'i lta stangs kyis bkug ste bcug pa rnams dang ro gcig tu gyur pas /
translated: Meditate on them as having the nature of Vairocana and so forth, arisen from bhrūṃ aṃ hrīḥ khaṃ hūṃ.🔽The awareness threads established in space, which are accomplished from bhrūṃ and so forth, are drawn into the hearts of the tathāgatas by the blazing gaze described in the tantra and are absorbed.

original: ye shes kyi tshon du grub pa rnams la bh'um la sogs pa mngon par bsngags nas /
analyzed: ye shes kyi tshon du grub pa rnams la bh'um la sogs pa mngon par bsngags nas /
translated: They become of one taste with the awareness threads, which are accomplished as the awareness threads.🔽Recite bhrūṃ and so forth over them.

original: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um /

original: zhes pa'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags so //🔽de bzhin du 'bar ba'i blta bas yang dag par gzi byin bskyed cing re re la h'i yig bkod nas bden pa gang gis sems can rnams rdul tshon mang zhing /

translated: One should enchant it one hundred and eight times with this mantra.🔽In the same way, one should generate splendor with the gaze of blazing, and having placed the syllable ha on each one, one should ignite the colored powders with the consecration of truth, saying, “By whatever truth the sentient beings are many,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la chags pas rjes su chags par 'gyur ba'i bden pa des rdul tshon rnams 'bar bar gyur cig ces bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sbar bar bya'o //
